It was the end of the school day and the Kendo club was quite angry as they encircled the Perverted Trio, preventing their escape. The scene had gathered quite a crowd among the students, while others had continued on their way, clearly used to what was happening.

Unknown to them, among the watchers one of them sighed. The person who sighed was a young man about 6 feet tall. He had fair skin that contrasted his black shaggy hair and hazel eyes. He wore the standard male academy uniform with the top few buttons of his jacket undone, and a silver chain across his neck.

"Idiots," Arashi muttered, shaking his head. He watched as the kendo club walked forward angrily. They had their shinai in hand and were glaring angrily at the Perverted Trio. He knew what was about to happen and continued on his way home. He didn't particularly hate them, but he didn't care for them either. It never amused him when they got hurt, but he did have to admit they were quite resilient and determined to continue to do that, even thought it always ended the same way. Though they did deserve what they had coming to them.

As he left the school he decided to take take a shortcut to his house through the park, and as he walked he noticed a envelope on a bench. His curiosity got the better of him and he walked toward it.

"What's this?" Arashi muttered. He picked up the envelope and looked at it for a moment. He didn't see anything really prominent on the front of it, or anything that seemed strange about it. He turned it over and to his surprise he saw that it was addressed to him. He opened the envelope and pulled out the paper inside it.

Find the love of your life!

Haven't you ever wondered what your true love would be like. To find that special someone that will make you whole! To find that special someone that will accept your past, your present and will standby you in the future. A relationship without equal where you feel nothing but joy. A relationship that brings out the best in you.

All you need to do is sign the bottom and soon you will find true love Arashi!

He wasn't sure what to make about the paper. It seemed like one of those charms that you would find at one of the temples. He didn't think much of it, and thought it had to be some kind of prank or something, but considered signing it anyway. After all what did he have to lose?

He placed his bag on the bench and pulled a pen out of his bag and took of the lid off of it. He placed the paper against the flat side of his bag and casually wrote his name down at the bottom and then put the pen back into his bag. The moment he did he saw a faint glow from the bottom. The moment the glow stopped he saw that there was now writing at the bottom. He knew for a fact that it wasn't there before and quickly read what had appeared at the bottom.

Thank you, and soon true love will come to you Arashi!

"What the hell," Arashi muttered in shocked awe. He lifted the paper closer to his face to get a better look, but before he could get a closer look at it, it suddenly caught on fire in his hand. His eyes widened and he quickly dropped the paper down and before it even touched the ground it was dust in the wind. He watched as the ashes flew off and looked back at his hand.

"How did that even happen," Arashi muttered in awe. Paper did not just combust for no reason. He shook his head and continued on his journey back home.

143121211.content:
At his house Issei was playing one of his visual novels gawking over one of the character's breasts in the novel. He let out a perverted giggle as a small trail of drool came out of the corner of his mouth.

Issei suddenly stopped gawking and began to stare off into space, as if nothing else in the world mattered to him, not even the pair of melons that he was staring at not to long ago. For some reason he felt unusual, like he had just been by hit something.

He suddenly blinked and shook his head. Right after Issei came to his senses a splitting headache suddenly came over him. He brought his hand up to his head and began to message it to try and make the pain stop.

He certainly had never had a headache like this before, nothing before had ever effected him in quite such a way as he was feeling right now. It wasn't like he felt sick or anything, he just felt...weird. The kind of strangeness that made you feel out of place in your own body. It was confusing and foreign, so Issei closed his eyes.

He turned off is computer and made his way to his bed. How could he enjoy eroge with this weird headache? He fell down onto his bed and pulled the covers over himself and groaned as he tried to fall asleep.

"Just a really bad headache," he muttered to himself. "The pain will go away after a good night's rest."

When he woke up he noticed something.

1431212111.content:
When Issei woke up the next morning he still felt incredibly groggy as he opened his eyes the next morning. The sunlight leaked in through his window, meaning that morning was here and that he had to get ready for school, as much as he didn't want to. He was happy that the headache that he had last night was gone now. He stretched in his bed and cracked his neck, getting all of the morning kinks that he had out of his system.

He felt something tickle his shoulders and brought his hands up and grabbed handfuls of brown hair. He made his way tot he bathroom and when he looked in the mirror he saw that his hair was indeed longer. Last night it touched the bottom of his neck, but now seemed to go a little past his shoulders. Not only that, but his hair seemed to have taken on a lighter shade of brown.

"How the hell did my hair get this long?" Issei questioned. "Meh, guess I just need to get a haircut."

He put his thoughts aside as he took a shower and noticed that as he rubbed soap on his body that it seemed a lot smoother then usual, but blamed it on the soap for that. Right after the shower he brushed his teeth, and put on a red shirt and the school uniform. He didn't need to get the Student Council's bad side any more then he already was after all.

Arashi sat in the back of the classroom on his phone as the other students talked to one another. He didn't have any of his friends in his first class so he was usually by himself and did his own thing until class started.

Arashi let out a yawn and saw Issei. The moment he saw Issei he blinked in surprise. The first thing that he immediately noticed was Issei's hair. It was far longer then it was yesterday. Before it was down to the back of his neck, but now it seemed to go down to his mid-back. Not only that but it was a lighter shade of brown as well.

"How the hell did his hair get that long?" Arashi muttered. He knew for a fact that Issei's hair couldn't have grown that long in a single night, and there was no way that he was wearing a wig. If he was then the Student Council would've taken it from him. Anther thing that he noticed was that no one seemed to notice anything different about Issei. They acted as if he always had long hair.

'Why is no one saying anything about it?' He thought to himself. He watched as Issei walked across the room and sat down in his seat next to him.

He wanted to see if he could find anything else about Issei that changed, but before he could get a good look at Issei their English teacher entered the room and begined class. He didn't need to get in trouble with a teacher this early in the morning. He'd have to take a look at Issei later. He knew that some weird was going on, and Issei was at the center of it all.

143231221313.title: Other (Free Route)

1432312213132.content:
"Hey Ise-kun, what are you looking at?" When Issei looked to see who asked him, he saw it was his best friend, Kiba Yuuto. Normally, he would be out on one of his usual requests, but just for today, Yuuto was free, a rare moment of respite for him, given his increasing popularity after the last Rating Game.

"Oh, just looking at some strange pendant I found on the way here." He held it up for him to see, his friend looking at the item with curiosity.

"It looks quite expansive. I wonder if a teacher lost it."

"Probably. I can't picture a regular girl wearing something like this... Say, does it look kind of familiar to you? I think I saw the design before."

"You do? Hmm... Oh! I remember, isn't it from that one show you showed me once? I think it belongs to the nurse."

"Huh? Oh, that's right! I almost forgot about it! Man, I can't believe I wouldn't remember the biggest pair of oppai I've ever seen. But wait, how come you remember it? I thought you said that show wasn't your cup of tea."

"Trust me it's not.", replied the Knight, as he didn't seem to understand the wonders of the female body the same way Issei did. "It's just that the principle of the show reminded me a bit of Buchou. I made me wonder a bit how it would be for her to be principal of the school."

"Really? I can't see her like that. I mean, she has red hair, but she is more tomboyish than Xenovia, and even some of the guys I know. And why a principal? Rias didn't say anything about being the headmaster of a school."

"I know, but is a fun thought, being in the shoes of a principal, wouldn't it? It kind of suits Buchou quite well to be honest."

"Are you sure this isn't your thing? You are quite strict yourself with your training and like following the rules. Are you sure you don't want to be the principal instead?"

"Haha, as much as I would like to experiment with that, I don't think- Ah!"

Yuuto stopped as a bright gleam escaped from the eye of the necklace and hit him with full force. It was lighting quick, as Issei barely registered it, but it was enough for the Knight was blinded for a second, while the Pawn didn't seem to be hit by the light. However this wasn't enough to make him lose his balance, quickly regaining his composure.

"Are you okay Kiba?"

"Yes, I am fine. Nothing seems to be off. But it seems like the necklace might be some sort of enchanted item. Sensei said he will have business at the school later, so we should show it to him when he arrives."

"That sounds like a plan. But what should we do until then? I mean, we can practice of fighting moves, but with the kendo club around, I don't think that's a good idea."

"I say we try to see what enchantment was placed on that thing. I'll head for the ORC building to bring some books and files that might help us find out what it is."

"Shouldn't we just ask Rias about it? Sounds like it might take a while if it's just us."

"Don't worry. Everything is already organized, so I should be able to return in a few minutes. Until then, please contact Sensei and let him know about the situation."

"Got it.", said Issei as he placed the pendant in his pocket, not noticing the continued glow from the eye before Kiba left. But as his friend took a corner, he muttered to himself: "Huh... Did his beauty mark disappear? No, I must be imagining things..."
1432312213132.title: No

14323122131322.content:
On the way, Yuuto couldn't help but feel a little odd ever since he was hit by the beam of light. It didn't really feel like a curse, but for a spell to be strong enough to affect him in some way, it meant that whoever enchanted the necklace had to be fairly potent caster. As for the sensation itself, it couldn't be really described as a sickness as the boy wasn't experiencing any sort of pain, but he could feel that something was off about his body, and he couldn't exactly name what was.

"I wonder who made that spell. Certainly, it must've been made with the intention of protection, as I doubt that pendant could be used as a weapon. But for such an item to be dropped in our school like that is a little sloppy. And I am unaware of a student who possesses magic abilities like that, otherwise Buchou would've investigated it. I can't really think of someone that isn't affiliated to either the ORC or the student council to know about the existence of magic anyway..."

While pondering, in addition to his mole beneath his eye, every other strand of hair beneath his eyebrows disappeared, leaving his skin smooth. His socks also seemed to have vanished, leaving his feet bare, which felt a little strange in his dress shoes.

"... And also, why would they pick that design for the necklace? It did look more expensive than just a piece of merchandise, so I would assume they tried to make it look as much as they could like the original. But that show has a very limited audience and not many people would watch it, given even Ise-kun said it wasn't really in his top 15 choices either. And that timing... I wonder if there was a trigger. I would've expected to activate way sooner, when Ise-kun talked about the nurse, given the item was made based on something she wears. I only talked about the principal and..."

Just then, Yuuto seemed to be taken over by a wave to dizziness that appeared out of nowhere. What was strange was that it also seemed to affect his mind, making the thoughts he previously had become foggy. He didn't notice how he slowly started to get a little bit taller or that his shoes suddenly transformed into a pair of black slippers. There was something that told him that the light from before was the cause of this, yet with each passing second, he was getting more focused on trying to have his head stop spinning rather than trying to understand what was happening.

"Ugh... That sure came out way too suddenly", mumbled the knight in a tone that exuded a little bit of annoyance, something he wouldn't really show for situations such as these. "I may need to freshen up a bit... although I may hope this will go away on it own..."
14323122131322.title: Yuuto feels a little off

143231221313221.content:
Thinking that the dizziness would go away quicker if he splashed some cold water over his face, he entered a bathroom that was conveniently close to where he was. Stumbling a bit by how lightheaded he felt, he almost went into the women's restroom before correcting himself and going to the men's. Inside, he shakily made his way to the sink and started to rinse his face, the cold water slowly making his mind to wake up from its muddled state.

Meanwhile, his feet became more petite as his toes formed a small arches. Interestingly though was that a small amount of energy was gradually collecting at said point, which made him feel a surge of power that was a little different than the usual Devil power that he normally had. Said feeling however was ignored when his face started to tingle a bit. He couldn't really notice due to the fact that he was still splashing it with water, but his masculine features were getting softer with his lips plumping up a bit. After feeling that the wave of vertigo was gone, Yuuto took a paper towel and dried off his face. When he was done and looked at himself in the mirror however, he could feel that something was out of place, but for some reason, he had trouble telling what was.

"Hmm... Is my face looking different? Did I had a mole before under my left eye? No, that's silly, why would I have one? And besides, I would've noticed it if there ever was one.", said Yuuto, again with a tone slightly different than his usual polite one. He still sounded as upbeat as ever, he seemed to be a little more casual in his vocabulary. "Still, it really is weird how I got dizzy like that. Was it from that light? Or it was something else?... Eh, whatever. I am feeling good now, so there's no problem. Anyway, I need to go back to the ORC building to..."

Strangely enough, Yuuto actually had a lapse in his memory, as he had trouble remembering his reason for going their clubhouse. He was too distracted to see how his pants began to grow a little shorter on him while his necktie vanished completely. And despite his prolonged lifespan, which made him age a lot slower, he physically grew older to 19 years old.

"...Hmm... Ah yes, I remember now, I wanted to go and see what that light was all about in one of the books we have there. Geez, talk about having a brain fart. Glad to know I was alone when this happened... I can't really imagine how embarrassing it would be if Ise-kun was here..."

Taking one last look in the mirror before leaving, Yuuto smiled to himself, glad to see there wasn't anything wrong with him and also thinking he looked charming for a second, the teen now left the bathroom. There was something that bothered him with his own name as he went back on the corridor, Yuuto Kiba sounding off for him. After a brief moment, and hoping this was the last lapse of the day, he now remembered, as Yiuto Rija became for him his new name.
143231221313221.title: He goes to the restroom

1432312213132212.content:
"...And you say it looks like it did in that show? The one with the girls with big breasts that could use magic weapons of sorts?"

"Yeah, it does. Down to the last detail."

Issei was currently talking with Azazel on the phone regarding the necklace he found and how it struck Yuuto with a beam of light that made him stagger. He tried to explain the best he could what happened, which made the Fallen Angel a little confused by the circumstances of the event, as well as the overall appearance of the item.

"So do you think it's dangerous? It didn't look like it had a major effect on Kiba, but it was quite powerful."

"I don't think so. It sounds to me like something used to protect the caster or disorientate the enemy, so it shouldn't have that much power. Although I think it's for the best to observe Yuuto in case there were any lingering effects."

"I agree. I had quite a few surprises before with how strong some of these things are...", said Issei flatly, as he picked up the necklace to look at it again. Azazel knew he was referring to some of the gadgets he made that had... a few undesirable secondary effects that usually had the boy as the victim, which made him give out a nervous chuckle.

It escaped his notice that the eye of the pendant was still faintly glowing even now. His hands began shrinking down as the digits grew a little longer. And while he couldn't feel it just yet, his hands did look a bit more frail, as their strength was slowly fading away.

"That aside... Sorry for asking again, but does it really look like how I know it? I watched that program before, and I am amazed that you found one that is just like the original."

"I know. I can tell it's not regular merchandise either."

"And what's the quality of it?"

"It looks genuine. The rock in the center didn't seem like glass, it is like a real jewel. And the edges seem to be silver too."

"Now that's bizarre. This isn't the first time someone turns a piece of jewelery into a magic item, but for someone to go as far as to style the thing to the real one makes me think that whoever made this has a little too much time spent in front of the TV if he went the extra mile for the design..."

"Most likely... Anyway, when do you think you can get here?"

"It might take a bit. After the whole mess with Cao Cao, there are quite a few things that needs to be resolved around here. But I'll come as soon as possible and I'll also give Rossweisse a heads-up to come with me if she finishes her job."

"Okay. Also, can you please not tell Rias about this yet? We all just got a break after the battles up until now and she doesn't need to worry over something that's maybe isn't a real emergency. Just let her finish the job for now."

"Always thinking about others, aren't you? Fine, I'll be tight-lipped for now. I'll also keep it a secret from the others too. You and Yuuto just wait for a bit, I'll come in no time."

"Thanks Sensei.", replied Issei with a smile as he finished the conversation before a small chill ran down his spine. "Was that a cold breeze? I hope I won't catch a cold or anything." He missed how his skin was now silky smooth and now there wasn't any hair or imperfection on it. In fact, it looked almost like he took daily care of his body and it didn't look like it belonged to someone who was out training daily.

Now came the waiting game. He originally came to school to help Matsuda and Motohama with sneaking into the girls' locker rooms, but the two caught a cold and didn't tell him, and when the girls caught him hiding, they jumped to conclusions and began punishing him like usual. He could wait for Yuuto, or he could try and have a bit of fun spying on the girls in retaliation.
1432312213132212.title: Speaking with Azazel

14323122131322121.content:
Thinking that since he didn't had any opportunity to actually look at the girls, and with him being on his own for a short while, Issei decided to actually take a few peeks at the girls while he had the chance. Thus, he quickly made his way to the locker room and then hid himself in one of the lockers that he knew wasn't occupied. He was glad this time Xenovia wasn't around to blow his cover, and hoped that the girls didn't begin to get too suspicious and start checking around the room for him. Conveniently enough, within five minutes, the girls actually came after the kendo practice finished and began undressing as they wiped off their sweat.

"Whoa! They really went the extra mile for new designs! I didn't try to look at them for a while, and I am glad I didn't miss the opportunity! I just hope Rias won't find out about this. I know I should stop doing this, but this is one of men's needs after all. Not to mention I actually deserve it after those two goofballs left me on my own." For once, he was happy that his plan wouldn't be ruin by some external factor, the only possible way of him being caught was him somehow making noise, although he trained himself to remain silent whenever he hid himself in a locker after many attempts before. He was just glad no one actually saw him practice something like this, otherwise this would've raised a lot of eyebrows.

As Issei indulged himself in observing the girls' figures, especially the breasts, and sometimes the designs of the underwear the had, he felt a little bit of discomfort as his shoes and his pants both turned black and started to tighten on him. It also hurt his feet a bit as they started to grow smaller inside his footwear, with him gaining a pedicure in the process. He ignored this slight discomfort as he tried to continue watching the girls. He was a bit surprised Ddraig didn't try to say something to admonish him for what he was doing or at least complain about the situation, but figured he was most likely sleeping, thus he didn't ponder too much on it.

While looking around, he heard a certain conversation Murayama and Katase started between themselves.

"Hey, have you seen the new nurse we're getting? I have never seen anyone look so amazing in my life!"

"Me neither. She really looks like a model and her figure is something unbelievable! How does she manage to support her chest like that? I wonder if that's how Rias-senpai and Himejima-senpai would look like in a few years."

"Oh yeah! I can totally see that!... Although her choice in clothing is a bit too... out-there...", said Katase frowning a little as she gave as Murayama smiled a bit nervously.

"W-Well, with that I have to agree. She needs to take care of herself much better. I am shocked she didn't said anything about how she looks..."

"I've seen some guys watching her like a pack of wolves... I want to try and tell her that she needs a new wardrobe, but she is so kind to us, I don't want to somehow hurt her feelings if I say something that would make her feel... inadequate or immodest..."

Now this was something Issei was not aware of.

"A new hot nurse? When did she come? And how come I didn't know anything about this? I haven't seen anyone new around the school, but then again, I didn't go to the nurse's office lately either. Did those two knew about this? There's no way the didn't, but to not even give hint about it is not something those two would do, as they like to brag whenever they find someone of interest..."

Issei's thoughts distracted him to miss how a few strands of his hair started to frame his face as his spiky hairstyle was slowly flattening. His changes didn't stop there as some of the times where he peeped at the girls in the past vanished from his mind entirely. This wasn't something major at the moment, but it became the start of what was to come...
14323122131322121.title: Peeping

choices: He goes back to the school
143231221313221212.content:
Yiuto soon reached the main entrance and got outside. His hairless skin made him shiver a little against the slightly cold breeze, but didn't think much of it.

"Okay, now I should be making my way to the ORC. Can't have Ise-kun waiting for me."

As he made his way towards the gate, the sense of urgency he had before seemed to disappear. His nervousness regarding the incident was slowly evaporating, and was having trouble thinking that there was a reason for him to leave at all, which made his pace slower. He scratched his hair a bit as it started to lengthen, his already silky hair getting a little more shine to it as he walked.

"It sure is a chore... I wanted to be able to train here, today and having Ise-kun around to keep me company would've been a bonus. Instead, that necklace had to throw a light beam at me and make me lose my cool...", he mumbled to himself as he looked at the empty yard. "I wonder if I could do a lap or something before I leave. It's not like someone would see me..."

At that moment, his calves tingled as their muscles contracted and changed. Their mass became a little smaller, but they became leaner and sleeker, with their force increasing by a fair margin. Also, his pants, which revealed a bit of his calves, started to roll themselves out as the material became more stretchy and their pockets vanished as well.

Yiuto shook his head, as a bit of his original personality resurfaced. "No, I can't waste time like this. I have no reason to train like this, not when there is an emergency." The small part that urged to act serious however was quickly buried by the new emotions and thoughts he had. "But is it really urgent? I feel fine and there doesn't seem to be anything out of the ordinary. I don't know why I was even in a rush. What's the worst that could happen anyway?... Such a pain the butt... I was so energetic when I came here today, and now I feel very upset for some reason. It's not like I mind looking into it a bit more, but his feels so useless... And somehow this is getting on my nerves, and I don't even know why. Maybe I need a distraction or something..."

Yiuto was never as expressive on a daily basis as he was right now, and his fuse wasn't as big as before. It was nagging him why he was so angry all of a sudden over something he considered trivial, but he had to deal with his emotions anyway. He started to try and find his happy place as he made his way slowly to the ORC building.

He tried to remember the times when he was spending with his friends and enjoying their company. But along the way, Yiuto's feelings began to expand to the rest of the students. It felt a little strange for him to imagine the entire student body to be his close friends. He knew he had to protect everyone in case something happened, but there was a no need to share his feelings with so many people. When he tried to just focus on the ORC members, he somehow didn't felt as connected to them as before, and was starting to think that he should be considering someone else his friends.
143231221313221212.title: Going outside

1432312213132212122.content:
The more he walked, the more Yiuto felt confused over his own emotions. He knew he had a duty to protect the students from whatever threat may loom over them, human or not, now given that Rias and her peerage having a greater chance to be targeted after defeating the Khaos Brigade, but somehow said feelings were turning into something a parent would do to defend their child, which was especially weird for him. Sure, he was a person that would jump in the frontlines if it meant shielding his friends from harm, but if he thought someone like Akeno would be more fit for the role of a caretaker than he was.

"Man, this is getting weird... I thought I would just chill out a bit and think of something nice, but now I have another dilemma? My mind sure likes to play tricks on me today for some reason. I hope this isn't because of a lack of sleep or something like that... Sure I had plenty of paperwork to do last night, but it's not like I had a choice in the matter."

Yiuto felt that something was wrong about that line of thinking, as he never had any jobs that had him signing papers, and even in the time he worked with the club, he always patiently helped with the paperwork when he was needed. But as he slowly aged up once again, this time to 22 years old, said thought was dismissed quickly. He didn't get that much height this time, as his body grew proportionate to his new age. His hands grew more slim alongside his arms, as they both looked smaller compared to how they were before. However, despite their more dainty appearance, they both felt stronger. Also, his collared shirt lost the black lines it had, becoming pure white, while the material shifted a bit, the cotton being mixed with polyester, as it started to resemble his pants a bit in terms of texture.

The changes didn't stop there, as some of Yiuto's memories with him fighting using swords being replaced with him using his fists instead. This style didn't align too well with his own knightly image. But he began to think of himself less of a swordsman and more of a brawler as within his mind, his name was replaced once more, this time to Yiuro Roijo.

"...Damn, it sure sucks having to sit in my office alone like that all night long. I am so glad I had enough coffee to keep me awake. Although... Where am I right now?"

Yiuro realized that he was no longer on the path to the old school building and he was now in the middle of the woods. Normally there should be no issue in getting there, but his sense of direction seemed to have gotten worse. Instead of trying to get back on the path, he gave out a sigh, as he started to head back.

"I don't know why I even thought of going to the ORC. I can just browse on my laptop than go there and maybe not find anything. It's going to be much faster anyway. Sill, I need to get better at paying attention to my surroundings. Last thing I need is for someone to know how horrible I am at reading maps..."

He was getting increasingly more dismissive of the entire situation, the idea of the occult staying in his mind, but he was thinking of the light less than a danger and more of an annoyance at most. On top of that, he was slowly getting a bit more distant of his group of friends, as they were starting to become regular people, like the rest of the students. On the way back, his hair was beginning to get a reddish tint as it started to lengthen, currently covering his ears.
1432312213132212122.title: He goes back to the school

14323122131322121222.content:
A few minutes ago...

Issei continued to listen to the conversation between the two kendo girls. He brushed away a strand of hair as his mane was beginning to lengthen without his notice. His bangs started to frame his face as the rest of his hair in the back was slowly getting longer, now reaching his neck. He was too distracted by their talk to actually acknowledge what was happening.

"So this lady got here a about a week ago and is still trying to fit in? How come Rossweisse-san or Sensei didn't mention that? They work for the school, so we should've gotten a heads-up about her. Seeing Aki enter the room, made Minori give a little sigh of relief as she sat back on the chair.

"... But anyway, did you find out what that spell was all about?"

"Not really. I've looked around, but nothing I found really indicated to be anything else than a defensive spell made to confuse the enemies. Other than those weird feelings we got ever since that light hit us, there really wasn't anything harmful."

"I see. It was a little strange how it affected us, given our high endurance to enchantment type magic, but I suppose the caster was quite powerful. Maybe it could've been worse, but I suppose our resistance nullified part of the effects."

"Looks like it. Speaking of strange though, why did someone try and steal the necklace from you? I was thinking maybe it was for selling on the black market. Is it really that valuable?"

"No, it's not. While the gem is quite valuable, it's not very expansive, nor is it a magic item. It is a little strange to consider a jewelery thief would go as far as to put a spell like that on it just to ensure no one takes it if they lose it."

"Kind of makes sense. Also, if they tried to steal it, they did a pretty bad job doing it. It was right in the middle of the hallway, so it was impossible not to see it. To lose it like that must mean they have zero talent at robbing."

"Agreed. Also, nothing else seemed to be missing from my office either, so maybe it wasn't a thief..."

"Well, I don't think it really matters then.", said Minori as she put her hands behind her head. "Whether a mage did everything as a prank, or put a spell on it by accident and left, since we're both okay, then everything's fine. We'll just need to look around for anyone that could've did it to ensure it doesn't happen anymore. Who knows, maybe one of magicians that got their pummeled by us wanted to seek revenge and did a horrible way to do it."

"You sure are as relaxed as ever. But I suppose you are correct. It's not like dwelling on it would help, if we are physically and mentally fine... Although maybe we should use Valhelm to ensure there are no other lingering effects...", said Aki as she sighed.

"At one point I felt like I was owing her something. I didn't understood what that was all about, but strangely enough, I only felt that way at the beginning, not at the end, when the headaches got stronger."

On the side, Rossweisse, who listened to the conversation and helped in the search, was visibly mortified of the realization.

"W-What is to be done about this? A-Are Ise-kun and Yuuto-kun going to be okay...?", she asked in slight panic, to which the Fallen Angel realized her great worry regarding Ise's condition especially.

"I am not sure, but I am starting to get the picture. Remember that group of magicians that we repelled not that long ago? One of them had these items which resembled some of the things you see in TV shows like swords, potions, guns and so on... I think I recall the necklace that Ise talked about to be in his possession at some point. I am not sure how he found it, but it's possibly it affected both of them as it was probably activated by their magical signatures. Wouldn't have expected to turn them into women though. I guess our little culprit may be as perverted as the kid is..."

"Really? So it's a type of body-alteration spell that also affects even reality?"

"I wouldn't go so far, but it is a possibility. Fortunately, I doubt it is something that's outside your area of expertise. It was made by a regular magus, so maybe the effects aren't as strong. "Most likely. In case things go south, we should have the whole party. Anyway, once find out what happened to Ise... I guess we both know how they would react..."

I sure didn't expect this weekend to go like this. Man, just rewriting so many people's memories after this will be such a nightmare. 155321221.content: There are plenty of options here. So... Will he turn into Tomo?
155321221.title: Sure

1553212211.content:
Issei just arrived from school, and since it was Friday, it meant that he would finally have some breather room, especially after the test he took the previous day. Currently it was just him at home, as the girls were currently busy at the moment. Apparently, after the Rating Game with Sairaorg and the battle with Cao Cao, Rias and the rest of her Peerage were quite busy with various requests. Issei somehow managed to finish most of his word, thanks to Ravel's help, but he was getting quite tired recently, as he also had to study for school.

"Man... I'm beat.", sighed the Pawn as he slouched on the sofa, not even bothering changing from his school uniform, only taking off his blazer. "I didn't think I would get to be so busy... I wonder if Rias dealt with this before. Well, she had to at least one time, but she seems to be doing quite well, energy wise... Wait a second... Asia, Xenovia and Irina had the same schedule as me, and also had devil and angel work to do as well, but for some reason they didn't look tired at all."

He remembered that the Church Trio weren't nearly as beat up as he was, which was a little strange, especially for Asia, who doesn't have as much stamina as the rest of the group. Rias, Akeno and Koneko also seemed to be quite energetic as well, despite everything had needed to be done for the ORC, for school and the devil missions they got. Kiba and Gasper also seemed pretty okay, but he knew it was more because the former knew to more efficiently and the latter took things at his own pace.

"I wonder where they got all this energy? Did they learn a new spell from Rossweisse-san to help them? She also looked okay, but I don't think they wouldn't tell me if it was that... Hold on, what was that thing Akeno-san said about the milk they bought?"

Issei got up and went towards the kitchen as he recalled a conversation between Rias and Akeno, with them talking about how they drank some milk and felt reinvigorated. He initially thought it was an exaggeration, but he then realized they might've bought it from the Lilith, which would've made a lot more sense. While he didn't ponder much of it at the start, he now opened the fridge to see if there were more bottles left to have one for himself. Fortunately, there was one left in the corner. He picked it up and started to read the labels on it about its effects.

"... Really? Gives you energy and vigor after you drink this, and the effects are amplified if you take a nap? That's awesome! It does have a few ingredients I haven't heard about, but I guess they are specific to the devil world. But..." He then read a red piece of text on it which confuse him. ""It is to be consummated by women only". Why? I mean, it's not poisonous if they can drink it. Why can't guys take this? Whatever, I doubt anything bad will happen. It can't be worse than Sensei's projects."

He took the lid off, and after a quick sniff he started to drink down the bottle. The taste was a little sweeter than he expected, but he enjoyed it anyway.

"Now that was good... The girls should've told me about this, I don't know why they didn't. And nothing happened yet. So much for that warning."

He threw the empty bottle in the bin as he went back to the sofa, as he laid down, trying to sleep a little to see the effects of the milk.

"I wonder how will I feel after I wake up? Most likely amazing, if I am to believe the label. But still, this kind of reminds of that show... What was it called again? I know it had this really weird way to power yourself up if you drink breast milk... It's such a stupid idea, but then again, I am the Oopai Dragon. I hope this wasn't breast milk or anything like that... She show was kind of strange, but that Tomo girl really was a looker, with those oopai... I wonder if they are as big as Rias's. Well, I guess I have plenty of time to imagine how big they were while the girls come back."

As he tried to fall asleep, he started to remember the girl named Tomo. Not only did she had an amazing figure, and the purple hair gave her an unique look. While she was physically as weak as someone could get, she had a really sweet personality, which combined with her childishness and innocence made her look like a more absent-minded Asia. As his lids started to feel heavy, Issei started to think how it would be if she was real...
1553212211.title: Yes

15532122112.content:
He went to sleep, dreaming of Tomo and her large breasts, when suddenly, he found himself wide awake. Issei tried for another ten minutes to fall asleep, but all of a sudden, he didn't feel as tired as he did before. Confused, he woke up, pondering on why was this happening.

"That's strange... Is this because of the milk? I didn't know it had such a quick effect... Then again, if it from another world, I guess it does make sense more or less. But... I don't feel brimming with energy like it said on the label."

While the tiredness from before was now mostly gone, he didn't feel as refreshed as he thought he would. It was more like the sensation of him already being well-rested, but forgot to drink his coffee. He was still a bit groggy, but the slight sleepiness from before was now gone.

"Did it work the same for Rias and Akeno-san? They and the others felt a lot more energetic, but I guess this means the effect comes later, right? But if this wakes you up like that, why would it say to sleep? It's more like an energy drink more than milk if you think about it. Well, it's a bit of shame I couldn't dream about... Huh? Why can't I recall what I wanted to dream about?"

Surprisingly enough, Issei couldn't remember why was he getting so excited to dream, as he couldn't say anymore what was he imagining before laying down.

"Is this a side effect? I think Akeno-san said the bottles were in a box before, so I guess they threw it away, as it was just the bottle there. Is that why it wasn't recommended for men? But, if it's just short-term amnesia, I guess it's okay."

He stood up, doing a few stretches, but when he did, he felt like something was amiss with his body, but he brushed it off quickly, not paying much attention to the sensation too much. He then sat back down on the couch, as he turned on the TV.

"Might as well watch something until Rias and the others come back. Too bad the shows I usually watch are not at this hour, but there should be something interesting on one of the one hundred channels we have."

He then start to channel surf, until he would find something that would catch his attention. But as he did, his body lost all the hair it once had, except for the one on his head. Speaking of which, his mane became a lot smoother and silkier as it gradually started to lose its spikiness. The weird sensation from before reemerged for a brief second, but it wasn't directed at his hair, but rather his figure, especially his chest. But just like before, he didn't ponder too much, focusing on pressing the buttons of the remote.

As for the thoughts he had prior to his attempt to rest, everything that had to do with not just Tomo, but the show she was in was erased from his mind. But since he now forgot about it, he didn't consider trying to remember anymore, thinking it was just a mere side effect of the milk.
15532122112.title: He can't fall asleep

choices: Issei starts to get tired again
155321221122.content:
"C'mon... I know that this isn't the usual time to watch TV, but there has to be something I like...", sighed Issei as he skimmed through the channels. He passed some news reports, a few baseball or football games and some of the soap operas his parents would usually watch, but none of the above drew his attention. But as he went through more channels, his preferences slowly started to shift, as he skipped a game review and a rock concert, something he would usually watch, without thinking much of it.

Meanwhile, his clothes started to tighten around him, especially his pants, which caused him a little bit of discomfort, but he didn't seem to mind it too much. Also, his white socks, started to grow as their material became a little softer as they crept to the middle of his calves, becoming crew-length socks, similar to the ones Rias wore.

After another minute of searching, he stopped at a documentary about seals. Issei had nothing against watching documentaries, but he would rather do it if he had to for school or for another reason, rather than watch regularly. But he stopped just when the show started to show how baby seals are being nursed by their mothers.

"Aww....", gushed Issei when he saw the baby being breastfed. He was a boy, but he had to admit that the scene was quite endearing. "I wasn't always a sucker for stuff like this, but this is pretty adorable, I am not going to lie. That baby is so cute! And the way it drinks milk is so cute!... Huh?"

He stopped when he realized his mannerisms were somewhat similar to how Asia would react if she would be shown something like what he was watching. This was so against his normal behavior, that he got a little concerned about why he acted the way he did."

"Why did I sound like a girl? That sounded so weird coming out of my mouth... I think I should hide this from the girls. Xenovia and Akeno-san will tease me no end if they would hear me right now. I should see if there's something else..." He was about to change the channel, when he saw the small seal being nuzzled by its mother, which made him unconsciously gush without him noticing. "... But I don't want to spend more time on trying to find something interesting and I this is quite nice already... so I guess I might as well see it to the end."

While continuing watching the show, Issei tried to ignore the small tingling sensation that he felt on his feet as they shrank down, becoming quite petite, which made his socks fit them better They also got a pedicure, making his nails trimmed and a little shiny. But the callousness they once had was now gone, looking almost like Issei never actually did much effort with them before.

On top of that, as he continued to watch the seal family interact with each other, he continued to act in a manner which would be unnatural for him, gushing and giggling at times, as he got a bit more emotional in the process as well. There was also something in the way the mother acted that stuck with him, but he couldn't figure out at the moment what exactly it was, so he decided to figure it out later and continue enjoying himself with the show.
155321221122.title: He finds a documentary

1553212211221.content:
After another 15 minutes, the documentary ended, as Issei stretched a bit after having a blast watching the two seals.

"That was great! I think I might have found a soft spot for small animals. I wonder if the girls would like stuff like this. Asia and Koneko-chan might want to see it if I show it to them. Maybe Rias and the others will watch it if I ask them nicely. But who wouldn't like small baby animals anyway?"

As he giggled, his hands shrunk down, the same way as his feet as they become delicate, and losing their strength in the process. His hair also continued becoming silkier as aside from losing its usual spikiness, their ends also started to turn a bit wavier as well. And yet Issei was completely unaware of any of this, instead still feeling like his body was supposed to look different than the way it was at the moment, yet he couldn't place his finger on what was wrong, so he didn't think too much of it right now.

"... The girls are quite late though... I wonder if something happened. Then again, they went shopping at the mall, so it might take a while. Maybe I should've asked them to go with them and pick some cute clothes... I mean cool! Jeez, where did that come from?", pondered the teen, correcting himself. " Hearing myself saying things like "cute" doesn't really suit me, does it? What do you say Ddraig?"

He expected the dragon to answer him, but was bothered by the fact that he didn't hear any replay.

"Ddraig? Are you okay..." His voice cracked a little at the end, raising in pitch a bit, making his voice slightly higher, but just like before, he didn't notice this. "That was weird. I hope I am not getting sick or something.", said Issei to himself with a higher pitched voice. "I wonder why Ddraig isn't answering though... Well, he may be just sleeping, so I shouldn't bother him."

He was getting a little dismissive of the entire situation with Ddraig, instead focusing on his earlier thoughts. He was slowly getting a little more air-headed, as despite him not getting any dumber, he was starting to have a slightly less mature thinking process. Currently, it wasn't anything too noticeable, but eventually, this will become a more prominent trait.

"Hmm... Should I call Rias and ask her when she will come?... But she could arrive any moment though... Hmm, what should I do?"

While Issei was pondering with his cell phone, in his hand, his pants started to crawl up his legs, as they became smaller, while not losing their tightness. As they retreated from his calves, showing now his longer socks, the material also started to soften, as they lost their pockets. Just like his pants, his T-shirt also got tighter on him as well, as its sleeves started to vanish.

"My clothes are a bit tight. Should I ask Rias to buy me something bigger? I hope I am not getting fat or anything... Maybe I should check the closet and look for something else to change into..." Just as he was about to get up, a sound snapped him from his thoughts.
1553212211221.title: The show ends

15532122112211.content:
The front door opened, and the girls, each with a bag with clothes, took off their shoes. When looking to see who came, Issei's face brightened as he greeted them.

"Welcome home."

"Oh, Iseimo. Thank you. I hope we didn't left you waiting for too long."

"We all tried to find something to buy, but Irina took a bit too long when we went to look for shoes."

"Xenovia, that's mean! You also spent a lot of time looking for a pair of sneakers."

"It wasn't that much. I found something interesting on TV, so time didn't pass too slow. It was something Asia and Koneko-chan would love to see."

"Really? What was it about?"

"Asia, senpai can tell us after we put the clothes in the closet."

"O-Oh. I'm sorry, I forgot."

"Don't worry about it Asia. I also tend to forget things from time to time.", said Iseimo playfully, as he stuck out his tongue a bit. While he did that, his face became a lot softer, as it took a rounder shape. Also, every single stand of hair he had on his body other than the one on his head fell down, leaving his skin smooth.

"I don't think that's really something to be proud of..."

"Hehe... Wait. Are Ravel and Rossweisse-san not here?", asked the boy, seeing that two of the girls that usually resided with him to be missing.

"Rosseweisse-san went to school to talk with Azazel about a private matter, and Ravel was called by Riser and had to head home for a bit, but she said she will come home before dinner."

"I see... It's kind of a bummer that not everyone is here..."

"Don't worry Iseimo, we will surely fill up your time, now won't we?"

"Really?!"

"Akeno... Don't rile him up. And you know we and Koneko must study to not fall behind. Iseimo and the other already had their tests and we were busy until recently with our missions, so we need to recover lost time."

"But still... It's not like it's going to take too much, is it?"

"Hah... What will I do with you?"

Everyone sans Rias giggled at her sigh, with none of the girls finding odd that Iseimo was laughing the same way they did.

"Don't worry Iseimo. We will hold you company, won't we Asia, Irina?"

"Sure. We just need to put the bags away, so just wait for us a bit."

"Okay!"

The girls smiled at their love interest's cheerfulness, as they all went do their rooms, while he went back to wait for them on the couch. He was a bit dismayed that Rias, Akeno and Koneko would be busy for a little while, but was nonetheless happy that they were home. But there was something that still nagged at him a bit.

"Did Rias say my name wrong? I feel like she did, and the others did say it the same way she did... Nah, I might be wrong, and I just didn't hear it right. And asking them about it would be silly... Well, I am sure it's just me, so now worries there."

As he waited for the Church Trio to come back, his calves buzzed a little as all the muscle mass they had vanished, leaving them leaner and more shapely, but a lot weaker. If Iseimo would have to run right now, he would find himself winded a lot faster.
15532122112211.title: The girls arrive home

155321221122111.content:
When he heard someone walking down the stairs, he turned around and saw Xenovia holding their game console, with Asia and Irina walking next to her.

"So... Until the president and Akeno-san finish studying for tonight, I was thinking maybe we should play for a bit. It's been a while since we last had a gaming session."

"I kind of knew she would pick something like this, but I am not going to lie, she somehow roped me in, and now I am a bit of a gamer myself.", said Irina.

"What game are we playing?", asked Iseimo.

"Just one of our favorite fighting games. One of our classics."

"Oh... Can I skip then? I am not really good at them."

"Oh, sorry Asia, I kind of forgot that you don't usually play something like this."

"It's not a problem. I'll spectate if you don't have anything against it."

"Don't worry about about it Asia. I also wanted to play a bit, so I am all up for a few matches."

Iseimo's reply made Xenovia smile as she readied the console. But as she did that, he noticed something curious. His game equipment was usually black with red highlights, but this time it was a plain dark-blue color. He found this to be a little odd, but he thought she may have received another model from Azazel, so he didn't ask about it for the moment.

Also, his pants passed his knees and were now resting around his thighs. But the changes didn't stop there, as the color transitioned to burgundy as a white line appeared near the end of his pant legs. In addition, his now tighter shirt became completely sleeveless while its neckline plunged a little bit as well.

Irina and Asia stood on the sidelines, while Iseimo and Xenovia each took their controllers to pick their characters. It was a game the two were familiar with, though it was a little bit more difficult than normal games. Still, the two enjoyed to play it regardless.

"So best out of three for starters?"

"Sounds good."

The two started their match, and from the start, Iseimo was getting an advantage. While Xenovia did get better, there was still quite a big gap between the two. But as the match continued, Iseimo was starting to get distracted by his fingernails growing out and gaining a manicure, his slimmer hands becoming even daintier than before. Despite winning the first round, his arms were now getting thinner and thinner, losing all the muscle mass it once had, making them look a lot more frail. In addition, Iseimo was starting to make more mistakes, making Xenovia slowly catch up to him. In the end, he still won, but his gaming skills were slowly starting to dull without a doubt.

"That was a close one, huh Iseimo? But I won't lose this time!"

"Hehe... Let's see if you're up to it."

Before they could start playing again, he started to slowly lose his more perverted demeanor. The times he was ogling the girls' breasts were becoming a little stale and confusing for him, as he didn't see that much relevance in the act itself. But that didn't make him see them in a less positive light, in fact he started to get a few playful, and slightly naughty thoughts regarding the girls' chests...
155321221122111.title: Playing a video game

1553212211221111.content:
The second match started similarly to the first, with Iseimo managing to get in a good couple of hits, and Xenovia already on the defensive. But after ten seconds, Iseimo was slowly starting to lose his focus, making errors, which not only made him drop the combos, but also allowed Xenovia to launch a counterattack whenever she could. This was in part because he was slowly getting less interested in the game. While he didn't outright think that it was boring, he found himself not as interested in it as before, given by the fact that he was bit by bit forgetting the combos and special moves his character was supposed to do.

The other reason was because he was having a hard time concentrating because his thighs were starting to thicken, crushing his groin the more they grew. This also felt somewhat arousing, making him stifle a moan as he tried not to make any noise. On top of that, his pants lost all of their pockets as their legs began to fuse together, as a small patch of white frills formed at their bottom.

In the end, Iseimo managed to somehow win by spamming a few attacks. When the second round started however, all the momentum he had at the beginning was now gone, as Xenovia continued her relentless assault from the previous fight while Iseimo kept making mistakes that always put him at a disadvantage. Along the way, he also began to feel frustrated over his mistakes, more so than usual. This, combined with the arousal he was feeling down below made him lose the second round, pushing the match for one more battle.

"What's wrong Iseimo? Already losing?", asked Xenovia teasingly, to which he answered back with a pout.

"Not even close!"

The final round started, and like before, the Pawn's mistakes kept piling on, while the Knight went on the offensive and it was now his turn to be at the receiving end of some extended combos. He managed to launch some pretty good counters, but the small wave of arousal kept distracting him, as his thighs lost all of their muscles, as a layer of fat, made his legs look a lot more eye-catching, but also a lot weaker compared to before.

He didn't notice how his height decreased a little, making him now slightly smaller than Xenovia and Irina. In addition, his shoulders rounded themselves out, disrupting his focus even more for a couple of seconds. After another eight to ten seconds, the battle was over, and the blue haired girl emerged victorious.

"Yeah! Now we're even!"

"... You play way too aggressive Xenovia!"

"Hey, that's supposed how you're supposed the game, isn't it?"

"To be fair... You are a bit too engrossed in playing at times though. It's kind of like when you draw your sword, you know?", said Irina, as Asia also added:

"You are kind of similar to Koneko-san sometimes. You were really focused back there."

"You don't say... I was never an avid gamer, but I guess I may get a bit enthusiastic..."

"I don't think I can win if you'll play like this. It's not a tournament."

"Sorry Iseimo. I promise to take it easier this time."

"Okay..."
1553212211221111.title: Iseimo loses the second match

15532122112211112.content:
Before they could start the game again, Iseimo suddenly felt some pressure in his abdomen, which made him put a hand over his waist.

"Can I go to the bathroom before?"

"Sure, you can go. We'll wait for you."

He then stood up and left for the toilet, not realizing he was now walking by placing a foot in front of the other. This made his hips shake a little bit, even if they weren't all that big. He also didn't notice that his pant legs continued to merge, making his legs be closer to one another. Once inside, after taking off his pants and underwear, instead of standing up, he sat down on the seat, thinking it was normal for him to do such. As he did his business, he could feel that the pressure wasn't exactly disappearing.

"That's strange... Did I eat something bad? I did drink that milk, so maybe that was the cause? But did it say it gives stomach aches? I don't remember..."

While he sat down, Iseimo's waist was slimming down considerably. His toned body gradually vanished, as everything that resulted after his training with Tannin was now replaced with a still slim, but weak physique. Every muscle that was put on either disappeared or was replaced with fat, which began to accumulate around his hips and rear, as they started to grow out.

But despite all this, Iseimo only felt pleasurable sensations that made him feel batter, closing his eyes as he enjoyed how his former toned core was reduced to an abdomen, who despite remaining more or less flat, had a small layer of pudge, that was still being compressed. He could feel himself losing strength, but it was starting to feel natural for him to be weak.

He couldn't recall the times he trained to improve his body anymore and instead he remembered practicing magic with Rias and Rossweisse instead. He also remembered having troubles doing so due to his scatter-brained tendencies that sometimes appeared without a good reason. There were times where his attention span was extremely low or his focus was somewhere else, if there wasn't a necessity for him to concentrate. Even if his grades didn't change, it was being solidified for Iseimo to be acting like an innocent kid, and that while it exasperated the girls sometimes, it was nonetheless something adorable at the same time.

Soon, the pressure started to fade away, but despite this happening a good amount of time after he finished, Iseimo didn't question it, as he liked the entire process anyway.

"That felt good in the end. I wonder what caused it... Well, I for sure don't mind if it comes back. It was a little unpleasant at first, but then it was great.", giggled the boy in a more childish manner.

As he pulled up underwear, he noticed he had much more difficulty in doing so, due to his bigger proportions. As for his pants, as soon as he pulled them up, he found that instead, they had become a skirt identical to the ones the girls were wearing,the signature clothing item of the Kuoh Academy female students. He however enjoyed the feeling of wearing it instead of getting scared or concerned. He liked how his legs now felt a lot more free and thought that the design was cute, yet mature at the same time.
15532122112211112.title: Bathroom break

155321221122111121.content:
Iseimo then went to wash his hands, but as he did, he looked at himself in the mirror, he couldn't help but notice that something was certainly off about his appearance. And yet, neither the hairless skin, the rounder face or the scrawnier arms were the things that he found different.

"My hair... It doesn't look right, does it? It looks a bit weird..."

He then took a hairbrush that was on the sink, that looked quite a bit more girly than the usual ones the the other occupants would have. It was also a purple color, which wasn't a particular color associated with any of the girls. But Iseimo didn't bother to think about it, as he believed that the brush belonged to him.

As he fixed his hair, his mane immediately smoothed and grew out, as it became quite wavy and with some of his ends curling up as well. On top of that, the color of his roots seemed to darken the more he brushed it, as a faint hue of purple starting to overtake the brown. When he finished, a fifth of his hair was now purple as now longer bangs framed his face. It also reached to around his shoulders, but didn't fall any lower than this. Iseimo was now a lot more satisfied with his hair, but still thought that something was missing. Before he could ponder what it was, he noticed something else near the place he took the brush.

"Oh, that's right. I forgot to put my ribbon on. I wonder why Xenovia or Asia didn't say anything about it."

The ribbon was simple in design, white with a slight shade of lilac. He styled it up in his hair, with the bow on his right side. Looking at himself again, Iseimo was now pleased with the way his appearance was. He still felt that there was something that should be different, but he decide not to let it bother him for the moment.

Just then, his T-shirt started to rise up from below, starting to reveal a bit of his waist, as the material began feeling a bit more soft than usual, losing the usual roughness it once had. His skin also lightened up and became a bit paler, as the times where he spent time outside training disappeared from his head, and was instead replaced with him going outside for a few walks, the rest of the time being spent inside his house, at a shop, or going to the local church, something he wanted to do, yet after becoming a Devil, he wasn't as fortunate as to do so.

Iseimo however didn't notice any of this, and instead he was concerned with something else.

"Why did I leave my shirt open? It looks weird now being buttoned up... Not to mention it would be a little embarrassing to walk outside looking like this."

He closed off his shirt, unaware that his top underneath was still growing smaller or that the shirt itself was a little bit tighter on him. He still didn't know why he felt a little bloated before, and wanted to ask Rias or one of the other girls abut the milk, but he thought that he should ponder about this for later, as the strange feeling disappeared and he didn't want to worry the group with a simple stomach ache. After taking one last glance in the mirror, and giggling a bit, pleased by the way his hair now looked, he went downstairs.
155321221122111121.title: Looking in the mirror

1553212211221111211.content:
On the way back, Iseimo's previous excitement of playing video games dwindled even more, no longer thinking that they were as entertaining as before, but he still found them fun, albeit not as much. Once Xenovia and the others saw Iseimo return, they broke from their talk, welcoming him back. They didn't think his new walking style to be any different than usual, despite the fact that his hips and rear shook a bit more than they did when he left.

"So Isemo, are you ready for the final battle?"

"You make it sound a lot more serious if you say it like that Xenovia-chan.", replied the boy, not noticing the different name he was called again, or that his speech pattern became more childish and feminine.

"Hey, I usually take these games seriously. Maybe you should as well."

"Thanks, but I think I'll pass. You know you are nine times out of ten beating me, with no chance of me winning."

"Who knows? Maybe today is one of your lucky days."

"Maybe..."

"You don't need to play if you don't want. You know Xenovia is a little too enthusiastic at fighting games."

"Thanks, Irina-chan, but I think I'll play anyway. It's not like there's anything to lose, is it?"

"That's the spirit! Now let's go!"

With that, Isemo sat down again, and took the controller, but this time picked a different character than before. With his current gaming skills and mentality, he should be grateful if he would find a fighting style that has a chance to beat Xenovia, than just fight with one character.

The game started and despite a valiant effort by landing the first few hits, Isemo was quickly losing the match. There really wasn't any plan in advance, he would either try to spam a move that would prove effective at first or land a lucky counter, but other than that Xenovia would usually dominate. He was once again distracted however, this time by his back feeling a little stiff, so he tried to reposition himself on the sofa. But as he did, his spine now arched, pushing his chest and rear a bit more. The round ended, without surprise, with Xenovia's win.

"Yes! Now one more time!"

"I am not defeated yet!"

The second round started, and Isemo used the same pattern as before, without that much success. But the excitement left the swordswoman vulnerable for a brief second, in which he tried to punish her, which made the two combatants now having around the same amount of health.
