As the forth episode was rolling, his manhood, which has been reduced to a small nub, was nearly done shrinking, but Isaruga was too distracted by the show and his imagination as he didn't notice the fever, let alone the changes.

When the show reaches the end and the two girls kiss after one believes she has seen a ghost, the small nub went inside of him, making him officially a girl, the nearly faints due to the heat he was experiencing, as the new girl's name entered her mind: Ikaruga Hyoudou.

As soon as the episode ended, Ikaruga made her way to the bathroom and threw some cold water over her face. After cooling herself down, she looked in the mirror.

"Where did that heat come from? I am sure the room temperature was normal. First there was that shiver that hit me on my way back to school, and now this. I hope I am not getting sick. Huh?" When Ikaruga looked at herself in the mirror she was surprised to she that there wasn't any sweat anywhere on her clothes. "How can this be?... Was the heat just my imagination...? I recall nearly fainting and the room felt hot, but there is no sweat and the temperature is normal... Or was it some reaction like the itchiness from before? ...I think I should rest now. Whatever happened to me before didn't seem to make that much of an effect on me other than some momentarily discomfort. I should consult Rossweisse-sensei about this tomorrow morning..."

When she got back in the bedroom and saw that the clock was around 21:30, he closed her computer, turned the light off and laid on her back on her bed, feeling rather tired.

"Maybe I should nap a bit until Rias-san and the others come. They will wake.... me up once they arrive... And maybe I can kiss..." She couldn't finish her sentence as she drifted into sleep.
1553221222222112111111121112.title: A romance show

15532212222221121111111211121.content:
Meanwhile, about 100 meters away, Rias, Akeno, Asia, Koneko, Irina, Xenovia, Ravel and Rossweisse were returning from the spa, relaxed and smiling after their pampering session.

"Hah... That sure was pleasant. I must thank Sona for telling us about this place.", said Rias.

"Yes. I really felt amazing. I never knew such massage techniques existed."

"Right Asia? The women said that those massages also improve your reflexes and your mobility. Don't you think the same Irina?"

"Geez Xenovia... You really care a lot about getting fit, huh? But other than the massages, the salt bath was fantastic. My skin has never felt as good."

"Indeed. The properties were really rejuvenating."

"Well Koneko-chan, the minerals used in the bath are said to have amazing properties that can also cure aches."

"You knew about it as well Ravel-san? I thought no one would look up for the remedies like I did."

"Ufufu... Seems like Rossweisse-sensei can get matched in knowledge in things that aren't related to magic.", giggled Akeno as the others did as well.

"Still... I feel bad for Ise.", said Rias with an apologetic face.

"Yeah... If we knew there was a section for boys as well, we could've had him tag along. And this was on the same day Matsuda and Motohama were sick as well."

"I think it is a good thing since it means there will be less perverted things happening at home."

"But it still must've been hard for Ise-san to be alone as well."

"I agree with Asia. We could've taken Ise-kun at the spa. I guess Sona must've forgotten since Saji-kun never went there as well."

"I wonder if Kiba or Gasper were invited to spend time with him."

"I doubt it. Yuuto-san is busy with his upcoming test and Gasper-kun is still.... a bit apprehensive with going out at night on his own."

"Well, we're all going home now. So let's make it up to Ise!", said Rias as the other girls nodded.

"I wonder if Kaa-san and Tou-san are already home."

"Who knows? It comes down to how long their meeting was."

"Speaking of them... There was something weird that happened at the spa.", said Ravel.

"What do you mean?"

"Well, when I took a break to look at the messages, Ise-sama's mother asked me if any of us wanted some green-tea ice-cream. She said that it was Ise-sama's favorite flavor as well as beverage and wanted to know if we wanted more. I said yes, but I wasn't sure why she thought that..."

The other girls looked a bit puzzled for a second.

"Asia, Irina, did Ise said he like green tea?"

"No..."

"As far as I know, no. He was never against it, but I wouldn't say it was something he would love to drink or eat."

"Maybe he got to like it recently?", asked Koneko.

"I don't think so. He never mentioned it before..."

Soon the group reached their house and went inside. After taking off their shoes, Rias said:

"Okay, I am going upstairs to check on Ise."

"Ara ara... Don't think you can get an advantage so easily Rias."

"I-I'm coming too!"

As Akeno and Asia followed Rias upstairs, the others sighed and began to wander a bit around the house. Suddenly, Koneko noticed something as she signaled Xenovia and Irina too come over.

"What is it Koneko-chan?"

"This.", said the Devil Nekomata as she pointed towards an extra pair of brown dress-shoes. "Did Senpai come at school with these?"

"Uh... I don't... think so. I could swear he went with sneakers today."

"Maybe something happened to them and replaced them? I know he has a spare pair."

"I know, but look Xenovia! The pair looks a lot smaller than usual. In fact, it looks like one of ours...."

The group was confused by this and Irina asked a bit shaken:

"Do you think... He invited another girl?"

"Impossible.", said Koneko firmly. "Other than us and Sona-kaichou's group, the rest of the girls still view Senpai as a pervert."

"Yeah, and the shoes belong to our uniform, so I doubt she would be from somewhere else."

As the girls were facing the dilemma, Ravel came over.

"I checked the freezer and indeed there was some green tea ice-cream inside as well as some green tea drinks in the fridge... I never knew Ise-sama would like this stuff so much..."

"He wouldn't...", replied Irina. "I mean, he likes tea, but there isn't a type in particular that he likes..."

Just as the four were ready to discuss the strange things, something happened...
15532212222221121111111211121.title: The girls get home

choices: The rest of the group comes in
155322122222211211111112111211.content:
The door opened, revealing Issei's parents returning with big smiles on their faces. Upon noticing the girls they saluted them as the girls did the same.

"How was the meeting?"

"It was great. We had lots of fun talking about the past, remembering our time in college as well as what we did afterward."

"We also had our share of laughs over a few drinks as well. We might've even gotten a little tipsy.", giggled Issei's mom as his dad sneakily pointed towards his wife, making the girls laugh a bit. "Oh, I forgot to go to the supermarket buy the ice-cream! I'm so sorry."

"There's no problem. But if it is okay... did you get a message about a guest?"

"Huh? No. We would've been told if someone came here.", said Issei's dad as he took off his jacket.

Irina sighed a bit in relief as the other girls already knew that Issei wouldn't bring someone else home.

"It's just you now? Huh... I guess she must've been tired."

"She?", inquired Koneko as the other girls raised their eyebrows.

"I mean Ikaruga, our daughter."

"Oh... Wait! WHAT?!", exclaimed the girls in unison, startling the adults.

"D-Did something happen?"

"B-But you don't have a daughter! I mean, as far as we know!", exclaimed Xenovia.

"A-And what happen to Ise-kun? Your son?"

"A son? Well, as much as we would've like to give our little Ikaruga a brother, I am afraid she is our only child. Although Ise does sound like a great name for a boy..."

Upon hearing the father's words, the girls froze. They were confused, shocked and scared that something happened to Issei.

"Uh... Are you girls okay? Did you also drink a bit tonight? I mean I know Rossweisse-san isn't that great with holding her alcohol..."

Before any of the girls could mutter anything, Rosseweisse came over.

"I am sorry about that. One of the treatments at the spa was having us inhale some special incense that said could make our heads a bit of a mess if we do it too much. Now if you excuse us, we will go clear our heads a bit."

"Oh, okay. We will go to the kitchen and eat a bit. Tell us if you're hungry. I know it is a bit late, but you can't just skip a meal."

The young teacher nodded as se took the other four to the living room and after telling them to be quiet, Ravel asked frantically:

"Rossweisse-san, what's going on here? And what happened to Ise-sama?"

"Did someone hypnotized the parents?", asked Koneko, trying to find an explanation.

"I'm afraid not. Please look at this.", said the woman as the showed them a picture. When the looked at it, their immediately panicked. It was the photo with Issei and Irina when they were kids. But instead of Issei, there was a girl with shoulder-length black hair and blue eyes.

"T-That's impossible! I've never seen this girl in my life!", cried Irina.

"I believe you. Trust me, I've seen the photo before, and I know Issei-kun was in it. But it wasn't just this one. All the photos which had him before, instead were with this girl instead."

"T-Then what happened to Senpai?", asked Koneko, now very afraid.

"Hold on... Isn't Buchou going to Ise's room. Doesn't that mean..."

Meanwhile...

Rias, Asia and Akeno reached Issei's room and slowly opened it. They were surprised to see to see the lights turned off and somebody already on the bed. But since the figure was not under the sheets, they realized that the person was just resting.

"So he got that bored he went to sleep. He may like to indulge in his fantasies, but I guess even that wasn't enough to keep him awake.", said Rias with a small smile.

"I am sure Ise-san did something else as well. Who knows?"

"I can really picture him training a bit since he had nothing better to do. But right now, I am ready to give him a bit of pleasure."

"Hey, no fair Akeno! I am the first to do that!"

"I-I will not back down either!"

The three ran a bit to the bed and almost jumped on it as they hugged Issei. But there was something off...

"Akeno, move a little. I am only touching your breast."

"Huh? but I don't feel anything. Also Asia, am I touching your hair by mistake?"

"N-No. I thought it was Rias-oneesan's."

"Huh? But I am on top of Ise. How can you touch my hair if you are on the side?... Wait. If you are on my left, Akeno is on my right and I am on top... Then whose breast am I touching."

"Hmm..."

Just then, the three heard a soft groan from the person sitting on the bed. After the person clicked their fingers, the light came on, and the three were shocked to see who was on the bed.

"Welcome home Senpai.... Ah... While I am happy you came home, can you please not squeeze my breast so hard?"

There was only one thing the three could do right: scream.

"KYAAAAH!"

(What Ikaruga looks like: http://fu-reiji.deviantart.com/art/Cherr...)
155322122222211211111112111211.title: The parents arrive

1553221222222112111111121112112.content:
The three girls quickly got off the bed and jumped next to the door as the girl who was on Issei's bed rubbed their eyes as she looked at them.

"Can you please not scream Senpais. I haven't been feeling well today. There was this shiver on my way home and the fever-like condition not too long ago. Not to mention the irritation- W-What's wrong Rias-san? Akeno-san? Asia-san? Why are you looking at me like that?"

"W-Who are you and what are you doing on Ise's bed?", yelled Rias with a glare as she regained her composure.

"Rias-san, what are you talking about? It's me Ikaruga. And who is this Ise you've mentioned?"

"What kind of question is that? You come here right in Issei's bedroom and you say you don't know him?"

"And we we don't know you! And why are you here?", asked Akeno in an angry tone as she also regained her composure, with Asia giving a pleading face to the girl.

"Please tell us what happened to Ise-san?"

"What happened to you? Why are you acting like that?... I know. Rias-san please look for the Pawn Pieces you've put in me."

"What are you-"

"Please..."

As much as Rias wanted to tell her off, her pleading eyes and genuine pleading she was receiving from Ikaruga made her check just in case. When she did, she got shocked to the point where she didn't know what to believe.

"H-How can this be?! The 8 Pawns you have in you... are mine....", exclaimed Rias stupefied as Asia and Akeno looked at her in pure bewilderment.

"You see Rias-san? I am your servant, just as I said."

"B-But this can't..."

Just then, the rest of the ORC entered the room in response to Rias' scream.

"Buchou! What's... wrong....", was all Xenovia could say before she and the others looked at Ikaruga.

"Xenovia-san! Everyone, what's going on with Asia-san and Senpais? Why are they so frantic and...." Upon noticing that the girls were staring at her and at her chest, she his hem a bit with her hands as she blushed. "C-Can you please not stare too much ? It's a bit embarrassing..."

The girls immediately blushed upon seeing the nervous girl fidget and slowly turned their heads and apologized... Koneko didn't believe it was possible for someone to scold her for staring at a girl.

"Rias-san, Please calm down. We don't want the parents to come here and see what's going on."

"Rossweisse, what's happening? Who is this girl? Why does this girl say she is part of my Peerage and why does she has the 8 Pawn Pieces that Ise should have?"

Upon hearing that, the teacher's expression narrowed. "It's just as I feared..." Meanwhile, Ravel also managed to realized what happened... and with a dead voice she told everyone her discovery.

"Ikaruga-san... is Ise-sama..."

The girls doubted their ears when they heard that, until they looked at the room. The opened closet showed a multitude of girl clothes complete with Kuoh's female uniform, there was a vanity in the back of the room, with a wooden sword next to it and after looking at the photo Rossweisse brought with her... Rias and Akeno were ready to faint, with Asia and Irina not far behind and Xenovia and Koneko stood motionless with their mouths opened.

"Please forgive them. They inhaled too much of an incense during the spa treatment. They said it could cause hallucinations and similar effects should too much be taken in.", explained Rossweisse.

"Oh my... Will everyone be alright? Do we need to call a doctor?"

"Please don't worry Ikaruga-san. It will pass after they will take a some fresh air. Now if you can please excuse us."

"Of course. If anything happens, please call me. I am more than willing to help."

Rossweisse nodded as she managed somehow to make the other girls to have the willpower to leave the room.

In Rias' room, everyone has gather, still in shock of what happened.

"Please tell me this is just the work of a magician or a Blance Breaker. I... How can that girl be Ise? It makes no sense."

"You can say that again. She even seems to be the complete opposite of how he is."

"I already looked at the pictures on display and judging by Ikaruga-san's and her parents' response, it is likely the rest of the world doesn't remember Issei-kun."

"But why do we remember then?", asked Asia in half-tears.

"Maybe because we are Devils. Whatever turned Issei-kun into a girl seems to not have an effect on us. It is safe to say that Sona-san and her Peerage would also be unaffected."

"But what could've made this happen?!"

"I don't know. But I noticed something with Ikaruga-san's aura. Other than the energy that a Devil would emit, I also found some residual aura that seems to be the cause of what happened. It is possible it is something made by someone since it is odd to affect only him..

"But what would..."

Rias and Akeno paused. Issei, a weird spell or curse and a person who was behind all this. This was a familiar pattern... The concern and fear on their faces was immediately replaced by rage as Rias made a communication circle next to her ear.

Meanwhile...

"Huh? What is it Gremory? It's quite late right now. Can't this wait until-"

""What on Earth have you done Azazel?!"", yelled the two girls in unison. ""Why is Ise a girl?!""

"Ow! There's no need to yell. I can hear you fine and- Wait. Ise is a girl?! What do you mean?"

"Don't play dumb Azazel. I know you are behind this! Whenever something weird happens to Ise, you are responsible for it!"

"I swear I didn't do anything! Look, I will see what happened okay? Until then, remain at your house and we will talk about this tomorrow... I know you want to come here and blast me to the moon without letting me say a thing, but we don't want to confuse girl Ise or your parents."

"...Fine. But you better find something by tomorrow."

Rias angrily finished the conversation as Azazel gave a deep sigh.

"Ise is a girl? How? Did the Gender Switch ray got lost? Nah, I made sure not to misplace that thing." He thought for a few more minutes as he leaned on his chair, until he looked a box with various items in it. Then, a sudden realization came to him as he face-palmed.

"Please tell me I did not lost that thing... I'm so screwed..."
1553221222222112111111121112112.title: The rest of the group comes in

15532212222221121111111211121121.content:
As soon as sunrise came next day, Azazel barely had time to come to to the ORC club before he was faced with Rias and the other girls. Most had a concerned look on their faces, but Rias, Akeno, Koneko and Xenovia in particular seemed like they were ready to attack him on the spot. After everyone went in ,as the possibility that a crater was to be formed where Azazel would be was quite high, if he didn't fins any solution, so they wanted to make things as conspicuous as possible.

"Um... Where is Ise, or rather Ikaruga?"

"At home. We told her we had some private business with you so she went out shopping, waiting for us."

"...That's a shame. I thought how she would be. She really seemed to be quite the beauty..."

The eyes that were looking at Azazel weren't amused at all by the joke he made as Akeno was ready to zap him as he must've put cameras in their house... again.

"You better have an explanation Azazel. If Ise is to stay a girl... not even Onii-sama would be able to save you..."

"R-Right... Now, where do I start...?", said Azazel with a nervous sigh upon hearing Rias' words. "Not too long ago, I asked Zeus to give me some magical items to study from different gods. One of the things I got from Poseidon were these wishing pearls."

"Wishing pearls?", asked everyone in unison.

"Yes... It is something the mermaids came up with, by injecting large amounts of magic energy into a pearl that exists only in Poseidon's waters, which already is something that has magic properties. After some trial and error, they managed to give the pearls the ability to grant wishes that, as long as they are not something massive that could change history or things like that, to be able to grant people's desires."

The girls were shocked to hear this and Rossweisse was also awe-struck a bit by the news as well. But something was off for the girls...

"Hold on. Are you telling us Ise wished to become a girl?! That's beyond absurd!"

"Rias is right. Why would he want that? He would rather wish for girls to appear in front of him, not to become a girl himself.", continued Akeno.

"Yeah! And even if he would why would he turn into a random girl like that? She doesn't even look like a female version of Ise!", said Xenovia s Irina followed.

"And why wouldn't he keep his memories or personality? As much as I like Ikaruga-san's purity, she is the complete opposite of Ise-kun!"

The girls were waiting for the Fallen Angel to give as reply, as Asia prayed to herself to not be something serious. Sighing yet again, Azazel picked up a video game box and snapped his fingers as a screen appear out of nowhere. The games' name was "Senran Kagura Estival Versus."

"Why are you showing us this? And what does this have anything to do with Ise?", asked Rias as the girls looked at him in confusion.

"This is a game Ise told me to order on the Internet. He couldn't find this anywhere in the local shops, so he asked me to use my network to buy this thing online and pay me back for it later. The game is about modern Japanese school girls that live a double life as a ninja. Now take a look at this." He snapped his fingers again and the image went to an Internet page. "This is the roster of the game. Now look at this character.", said the Fallen Angel as he zoomed on an image of a girl in a white uniform.

Upon looking at the character, the girls' jaws dropped.

"B-But that's..."

"Ikaruga-san?!"

"Yup. She is a character in the game. I doubt the Ikaruga you have at home wears this outfit, but it's surely the same."

"So... we know who she is. But why is Ise-kun-"

"Please be patient a bit." Azazel then put on a recording of Issei getting beaten by the Kendo club. "This is from yesterday... After I got the items I stored them in a box and went to my office. However, I tripped near the locker rooms and the box fell down. I guess there is where I lost the pearl..."

Then one of the girls picked a small shiny orb as Issei left.

"That's the pearl?"

"Wait, aren't those two the girls who usually chase Issei around whenever he is found peeping?"

"Indeed they are. And what the girl wished is that they wouldn't have to deal with Ise anymore... As for where Ikaruga came from, when he and his friend talked about the game and commented on Ikaruga's personality, which seems to hate perverted acts and such, they wished back then that she would exist. This is purely speculation, but I think when she made the wish, she must've thought of the Ikaruga thing as well."

The girls were stumped. They could never think that such an innocent mistake, from Azazel of all people, could spill into something like this.

"So it really was just a chair of events..."

"Yeah... Also you should be happy things didn't change more than they already did. If it was a complete replica, not only would she be a ninja, but she would also have a brother and would be a sword fighter as well."

"That would explain the chess pieces. She is still a member of my peerage... Wait what about the Boosted Gear?"

"I manged to contact Ddraig after you called me... He was quite broken. He slept through half of the changes and had to watch the other half happen. As disturbing as it was to watch that, he manged to keep more or less his cool. she can still use the Boosted Gear's power, but Ddraig doesn't think she can use Balance Breaker as the link between the two is blocked by the change..."

Azazel continued detailing some more things as the others listened carefully.Soon, the girls finally understood the whole situation. Given everything that happened to Ise, they were relieved that it was something reversible as it was the result of a wish that can be undone.

"Thank you Azazel. Now jut give us another pearl to undo the change."

"Err... You see, we could have a problem...", said Azazel nervously as the girls looked at him a bit fearful. "I... told Zeus to give me just one pearl, and since the one I had was already used, we might need to ask him for one."

"And we have to wait for it to get here?", asked Asia.

"... There's another problem as well. Zeus, and the other Greek gods will attend a meeting with the other European deities. And since the subject is about Rivezim and Trihexia, it will take a while..."

"How long?"

"Two weeks... And add another week for the pearls to get here..."

"WHAT?!", yelled the girls in unison.

"We have to wait a month for the pearl to get here? I hope you are not pulling our leg here Azazel. because if you do-"

"I swear I am not lying! If you don't believe me, then put Rossweisse ask Odin. He'll tell you the exact same thing."

"A month without my Ise... How will I survive this...?", asked Akeno in despair as the girls were with their morale literally gone...

"C-Chill down okay. It's not as if he's not actually here..."

"Azazel. He's not here. I can tell you that based on last night."

"Relax. I'll call Zeus as soon as possible. Until then, try to enjoy your time with Ikaruga. If she is the way the game describes her, it should be quite pleasant."

The girls gave a sigh of defeat, thinking about their Sensei's words. Hopefully it won't be so bad...
15532212222221121111111211121121.title: The explanation

choices: Azazel tells Issei about the pearls
155322122222211211111112111211211.content:
The following weeks went by as without surprise, Ikaruga was already integrated in the modified reality. She was part of the Kendo club and really good friends with Katase and Murayama. She also was sharing their views with perverted acts, which made her punish Matsuda and Motohama whenever the peeped as well. However, she would also keep a small speech trying to persuade the two to stop peeping and be more polite, which however fell on deaf ears. What was surprising about the two was that they kept their word in the end and despite staring at her figure, the two never actually got too interested in Ikaruga. She also was deemed one of the beauties of Kuoh Academy as her grades were on par with Rias and Akeno and her jovial, kind and polite nature attracted both male and female fans.

As for the ORC, things were... interesting to say the least. Since the events played in the ravenette's head just like they were before, but with her as a girl and other things here and there changed, the group had to behave like they normally did. It turned out that Ikaruga was actually bisexual, which made her attracted both to boys and girls. Kiba and Gasper, despite feeling honored to be praised by Ikaruga and enjoyed their time with her, felt quite awkward and embarrassed around her since they knew in reality it was Issei and she won't stick around too much, so they tried to be as formal as possible, despite her slight affection towards them. Rossweisse wasn't too bothered and quite enjoyed the girls' company and liked her well-mannered nature a lot, despite missing Issei a bit.

The other girls... didn't take the situation too good though. Xenovia really couldn't have much time for her usual activities that she usually did with Issei such as playing games, going to the karaoke bar or going to the track field to run together. Instead, she went shopping, watched romance shows and went to traditional Japanese restaurants and cafes. While it wasn't actually unpleasant, the fact that she couldn't do what she loved to due to Ikaruga's more feminine nature, really brought her morale down quite a bit. Koneko, Ravel and Irina, while not as demoralized as Xenovia, couldn't really enjoy their time with Ikaruga since they really missed Issei a lot, as seeing a complete opposite of him in the form of a girl, that was against perverted acts really game a bittersweet taste in their mouth.

Rias, Asia and Akeno were the ones that were the most devastated by this. Akeno really didn't find comfort in doing the same things she did with Issei such as cooking lunches for him, strolling through the park and studying together, with Ikaruga. In fact, she was actually slightly angry that she had to do these really enjoyable activities with someone who wasn't Issei against her will. As for Rias and Asia, besides the fact that they had to share the same bed with Ikaruga, the fact that they did all the things they did with Issei, including bathing, really made the two very uncomfortable. They just couldn't see her as the man they loved despite her signs that she is surely in love with them. The only thing the two found similar between Ikaruga and Issei was their shyness when it came to love, but she had an edge in terms of a bit more open than him. But all in all, it was unpleasant nonetheless...

After 3 weeks passed, Azazel received a few pearls from Zeus and as soon as they arrived, the girls immediately took one and wished for Issei to come back. The wish was a success, and he returned to normal, much to everyone's joy. However, since it wasn't too explicit, he still found himself without any memory of what happened the past 3 weeks. With some help from Azazel, Sona and Ddraig, they managed to pull off the lie of a sudden attack from the magicians that made him lose his memories. He still was a bit confused about this, but eventually swallowed the idea.

He was now playing the game he asked Azazel to buy, playing Ikaruga of all people as the girls prepared to g on a shopping trip.

"Are you sure you don't want to come Ise?"

"Come on Rias, we went shopping 3 days ago. I personally don't need anything. And I must still study for the test on Monday."

"And the game?"

"This is my break. Don't worry. I won't stay much longer."

"If you say so...", sighed Rias as she and the girls looked at the character Issei was playing and sweat dropped a bit. "So you're playing as Ikaruga?"

"Yeah. I can't tell why, but I feel some sort of... affinity. I am not sure..."

"What do you mean?"

"Well, I had this craving for green tea stuff for a while, I am a bit interested in sword fighting and I began to organize my dresser much better now.", said Issei as the girls looked at him nervously. "Also, I had these weird dreams with having her in my place... Do you find that weird?"

"No...", said all the girls awkwardly before leaving quickly afterward.

Issei wondered what was going on with them a they left. "I wonder if something happened. Ever since the whole memory loss thing, they've been acting weird... What exactly happened though? They are not telling me anything too detailed and not even Ddraig or Sensei said anything... Oh well. I guess I will never find out then. But I doubt it's that important since everything turned out good.", thought Issei as he returned to his game. "I never thought I would like Ikaruga, but she is quite cute... I wonder how would she be if she really existed...? Or any of the other girls for that matter? Well, I guess I can still dream..."

15532212222221212221.title: Haruka

155322122222212122211.content:
It was a rainy Monday in Kuoh City. It was about 10 in the morning and by now most students were already at school... However, Issei was not, and was right now yawning as he just woke up.

"That sure was a good sleep... I really need to thank Rias for this..."

Yesterday, Morisawa and Mil-tan kept him late into their night with their requests and on top of than, an incident with a rogue magician, which made him use his Balance Breaker, really drained him out as he went to sleep at 3AM. Unlike the girls who managed to rest a bit until the fight, he was so tired that Rias and Rossweisse told him to take the day off as it was no point coming to school and relax. He initially protested, but when the others, especially Asia and Ravel told him to not put his health in jeopardy just trying to make everyone happy, he relented and allowed them to excuse him for today. He was a bit worried, but Rias and Akeno assured him they also needed to have some rest days in the past, so there shouldn't be any problems.

After brushing his teeth, he looked outside at the dark clouds and the pouring rain..

"Man, the weather is horrible. When they said it would rain a lot, they didn't joke. I guess I can't get outside like this...", he murmured.

He then went into his room to dress up. Since he wouldn't leave due to the weather, he didn't bother putting on socks as it still was a warm day. It was laundry day today, so most of his clothes or either drying or in the hamper, so with no other option left at the moment, he put on the casual Kuoh Academy uniform with his signature red T-shirt underneath.

After dressing, he then checked the Boosted Gear for Ddraig. He was still sleeping as recently, besides trying to unlock more powers for him to use, he also suffered some migraines with the "Oopai Dragon" show as it gotten quite tiring for him listening the opening theme and all the discussion regarding it and so, he decided to sleep to get rid of his worries.

Seeing that there was no distraction at the moment and since he was already feeling quite refreshed, he grinned as he took a game he hid in his mattress. It was "Senran Kagura Estival Versus".

"Okay, It's showtime.", he smiled to himself.

He learned of the game from Matsuda and Motohama, his fellow perverted friends, which were now quite angry regarding his closeness to the ORC girls, but still taked to him. While he didn't find the girls actually be ninjas like the game described them, he learned from the two that they were giving a "modern" take on the concept as the way people know ninjas was deemed by Motohama too "basic" and the game needed something new.

He bought it as soon as he could and started playing the game in secret from the girls. While there wasn't anything erotic or naughty, it sure seemed like something that was modeled to his taste. The gameplay, the visuals, even the characters were awesome. But there was one figure in particular he was quite curious about.

"I heard the next chapter will be featuring Haruka-san. I really wanted to play her for a while..."

Unlike most serious characters the game had such as Ikaruga, Yozakura and Yumi, which really put a stop to Issei's fantasies, Haruka charmed him with how despite the fact she seemed almost as perverted as him or even on par with him, she still was like a big sister to the group. It gave her a charm which made her similar to Akeno a bit even, with her playful, yet mature side balancing it.

But there was a problem with him playing the game... During the last game session, Xenovia broke the console after several losses in a row to Irina and Issei in a fighting game. She got really apologetic afterward and begged to be forgiven, but knowing her personality, Issei immediately forgave her as he knew it was an accident. Currently, the console was out being repaired, but...

He got a prototype console from Azazel a few days ago. He said he made it to try and replicate, and even improve the conditions of playing games by adding several features such as virtual game immersion and real-life vision, and even the ability to make characters come into real life and become part of reality. Issei wasn't too sure of the last feature as it could really bring quite a lot of trouble... but nonetheless the console functioned perfectly, which made Issei really happy to have a replacement.

He plugged the game in, and after enjoying the intro, he got into story mode and started to fight as Haruka, her unique fighting style showing through.

"Man... It would be amazing if she existed in real life... She would be such good friends with Rias and Akeno-san... But I really don't think I need it. I have such wonderful people around me. I wouldn't trade my life for a game character.", mused Issei.

As he was playing, a stray lighting hit a power cable. While it didn't snap, it made the street go in a blackout. Also, the electricity found its way through the Hyoudou house and with the luck he had, it zapped Issei and and the console, knocking him off from the shock. Unknown to him however, the console made some weird noises as it was zapped as Haruka's data was transferred and was trying to activate the real-life materialization, but since it broke down mid-way, another method to make her become real was triggered...
155322122222212122211.title: Gradual

1553221222222121222111.content:
Issei was passed out for a second before he recovered. Compared the the electric attacks he normally had to deal with, this was nothing, but his body felt a little weird for some reason... When he regained his vision, he saw that the lights were off that some smoke was coming from the console.

"Oh crap! Did the lightning hit our house?"

When he looked outside, he saw that the other houses on the street were also with their lights out.

"A blackout? That sure explains a lot... But how did the shock got here?"

He took the console out next to the window to examine it. The cable looked fried, but the console itself seemed fine, only that it seemed that it's battery was also done for.

"Man, this is such a shame! And it worked fine too!" He then took out his phone to try and call someone... only to see that he couldn't. "What? Even the phone doesn't work?"

Upon closer inspection, he saw that he could still send out messages, but he didn't receive any reception for any calls or the Internet. Just then, a message from Azazel came.

"Ise, are you okay?"

He then replied back. "Yes. But the lights are out and the reception is gone."

"I've seen that too. Seems like a power line somewhere was hit. I already looked it up and someone is trying to connect your street to a different line so that you will have energy until the damage is repaired."

"How do you know that?... Actually, please don't say how..."

"I put a back-up generator in your house. If you wait a few minutes, I will turn it on. But the reception is something different. You should wait until later in the afternoon for that."

"Got it.", messaged Issei before he saw his phone blinking. "Damn, looks like my battery is out..."

"About that. You shouldn't charge the phone until the rain goes down a bit. The chance of another blackout may be possible, and you surely don't want your phone to die completely."

"What about Rias?"

"Don't worry. I'll tell her about the situation and that you are fine. I am sure that once school is done she will come home."

"Please tell her to not rush it. I don't want her to miss any classes."

"Well, aren't you considerate as always... Heh. Well, I'll tell her. Until then, just sit on tight until the energy comes back."

"Okay. I will.", he texted just as the phone battery went down.

He sighed as he laid in his bed, his phone next to him.

"I wonder if I should've told him about the console as well... Nah, he won't be mad about it.. Knowing him, he will just build another one."

As he laid down, the data transmission was done. Soon, Issei was going to get his wish come true in a way he didn't expect...
1553221222222121222111.title: He wakes up

15532212222221212221111.content:
As Issei laid down in his bed, he started feeling a little cold, which made him try to warm himself a little by rubbing his arms.

"Brr... Did I left the window open? I don't recall being this cold a little while ago."

He stood up and looked at the windows behind the bed. Indeed there was a partially opened window, but as he closed it, he realized the cold air couldn't have come just from one opening. But since there wasn't any other direction the cold could have come from, he simply thought it was just a breeze that passed through as he sat back on his bed, trying to get a bit more warm.

Without noticing, the cold was actually because his body hair completely vanished, leaving his skin a little sensitive. But he was slowly adapting to the temperature, and soon, he laid down as he didn't felt cold anymore.

"I wonder what that was... Well, I should actually think what to do with the game now that I think about it. I just hope it isn't burnt like the cable was... Either Sensei forgot to ground the socket, or the console was susceptible to the whole thing... Normally, it doesn't make sense, but i decided to drop that thing with Sensei's weird devices... I wonder how long the lights will be out... Oh well, I guess I can wait a little."

He then went into his little fantasy world, imagining the girls, and sometimes remembering them, making advances to him in different provocative situations. As he did, his feet became smaller as his toes became dainty and getting a pedicure. Also, his black pants were starting to get tighter on him as they began to lighten a bit.

But as he was thinking, he noticed something regarding his memories with the girls... which made him a bit disappointed.

"Am I really that flustered around them? We've been for almost a year together, and I still feel shy around them? Man, i really need to pull myself together."

Despite his perverted mind and antics, he usually doesn't exhibit a lot of confidence around the girls, especially in public. He went over his initial trauma with Raynare, and was able to finally be together with Rias and everybody romantically, now that he knows they truly love him... But he always deflected any provocative actions made by the girls at school and was still getting flustered with their actions at times. He didn't pay any mind to this before, and decided to just let things go with the flow... but he suddenly was feeling that he was not only acting like a scared rabbit... but also like a child.

"Those girls need someone that can measure up to them in confidence. How can I compare myself with them in decisiveness if even Asia is getting bold? I need to think of a way to be more mature as well... I am still unsure of myself even now of what to do with the girls..."
15532212222221212221111.title: He feels cold

155322122222212122211111.content:
His thinking was interrupted by the lights suddenly coming back on. Along with some buzzing around the house, it signified that things went back to normal.

"I guess Sensei brought back the energy.", smiled Issei. "But I can't charge up my phone until the rain dims out a bit... I should check myself to see if anything happened due to the shock from before though..."

He then left for his bathroom and took off his T-shirt and shirt to see if there were any marks. He didn't notice any, but he did notice how hairless his skin looked.

"Huh? What happened? Did the zap burn my hair? Weird that it was only that... Still, I guess I look better that way...", he smiled to himself as he didn't know where the last part came from. As he admired his skin, his hands began to slim down a little as his fingers became longer. "Well, I don't mind it if it is just that... I should see if the TV is working..."

He put his clothes back on as he returned to his room. He then sat in front of his large-screen TV and wasn't surprised to see the "No reception" message on it.

"Figures. But there should be some channels that should be available. I mean, it works on Devil Technology."

He then surfed through the channels, most of them being either without service or the reception was so bad, it couldn't be understood what was on. As he was still looking, a part of him wanted to check the console to see if the game was alright. But he couldn't do that as he didn't want to zap himself again, so he began to imagine the girls in the game a bit instead.

The images of girls in swimsuits were popping out in his head. His thoughts stopped on a pink-haired girl names Hibari for a second before he went to the other girls. As he did, his calves started to alter as the muscles shifted. They became smaller, but remained toned as some mass was slowly going upwards towards his thighs. Also, his white dress shirt was losing his black highlights as his sleeves receded to around his elbows.

But there was something he noticed. The image of a girl he was quite fond of, didn't seem to pop out in his head. He knew she was mature, but a bit devious and playful as well. He wanted to try and remember her, when a random strand of hair obscured his vision.

"Huh? Is the humidity that bad? Why is my fair falling like this? I mean there was that cold air a second ago... but my feet don't feel cold. Hey Ddraig, is something wrong with my body?", he asked his partner as he lifted his left arm up, but was surprised to not hear anyone. "Seriously? He's still sleeping? Well, after last night and his own agenda, I guess I can't blame him. Oh well, i guess I'll ask him later. Besides, it's just hair.", he told himself as he brushed the bang off to the side.

What he didn't notice was that his hair wasn't affected by the humidity, but was actually changing. His bangs were losing their usual spikiness and instead became a bit wavy in some spots as the color lightened by a shade or two.

After going through 50 channels, Issei only found some channels which were in different languages, a documentary about Antarctica, which didn't impress him, and a soap opera, which he didn't feel like watching. When he was about to give up and turn the TV off, he found something that caught his attention.
155322122222212122211111.title: The light comes back on

1553221222222121222111112.content:
He stopped upon seeing a chemistry show about the effects of certain substances on a person's senses and health. While his grades were in top 10 of his class, he never actually watched many documentaries outside the ones that he either needed for school or more recently, were about mythology. But this one seemed not just interesting to him right now, but also seemed helpful.

"I wonder... Maybe if I bring some of these concoctions in battle I would be able to inflict an ailment on the enemy. It sure looks helpful..."

He wasn't an ace at chemistry, nor was it his favorite subject, but right now, he was diligently watching the documentary. As the host presented different substances that were either man-made or found in nature in different combinations which had various effects on people, some changes happened in Issei's room. At his desk, a small chemistry set appeared as a few chemistry and biology books popped up as well next to his "special" magazines. But there were also a few books about puppetry as well among them...

"Hmm... This is quite helpful. Maybe making some bombs with these things to confuse foes would be helpful. I can easily ask Sensei to bring me some of these ingredients...", murmured Issei, without noticing his voice raised by an octave.

As he continued watching, the displaced matter that left his calves reached his thighs as they started to change. The muscles were slowly being replaced by fat, along with mass that came up. However, the muscles that remained unchanged were as strong as they were before, and maybe even a tad more flexible.

This made him feel a bit aroused by the fact that his manhood was a bit crushed now, but decided to ignore the feeling for now, desiring to watch the show. But as he did, he once again started thinking about the missing girl from his mind.

"I wonder who she was? She was also very pretty as well... Well, not as good looking as Rias and- No, focus on the show Iasai. You can fantasize later.", he scolded himself without noticing the way he called himself.

While his mind was wondering, his red T-shirt began to get a bit softer as while the show continued his sleeves were starting to recede as well.

Eventually, after about 45 minutes, when the documentary ended and gave a preview of the next episode, Iasai smiled to himself.

"Good, that should give some valuable information for my next concoction... Fufu... I guess soon I can really tell an enemy to "pick his poison". After all, I think I have quite a few ideas of how to win without working too much..."

Next to his closet, right near the window, there was now a box, which said "Caution. Might cause severe ailments if not careful", which contained a small number of Iasai's concoctions. And their number will soon multiply without a doubt...
1553221222222121222111112.title: A science show

15532212222221212221111121.content:
Feeling the need to use the bathroom, Iasai went back into the bathroom. For a second though, he wanted to sit down and was confused why would he try to do it. As he was doing his business, he went back to his thoughts about himself.

"That show about those substances will be helpful for the next battle I will have. After all, I need to put on a lot more effort in my fights. All I do is relying on the Boosted Gear, and not actively doing anything else if I don't use it... I am sure Rias would appreciate it more..."

As he thought, his hair once again grew, this time covering his ears. All the spikiness was gone as well as any greasiness his hair had, not being smooth and silky. Also, it became a lot more wavy. But while there were some bangs that here still unruly, the ones that were framing his face were curling a little at their ends.

"I mean, even she said not to depend on it too much to take care of my problems. I need a more diverse repertoire of moves... Maybe I could ask Rossweisse-sensei to teach me some enchant or ailment spells. I know my magic proficiency is not as high as the one she or Asia have, but it is worth a shot. I mean, I can't picture me being a sword fighter. Despite having Ascalon, I barely use it, and I can't measure to Kiba or Xenovia in terms of ability... not to mention that I am not up for such a direct way to fight..."

Despite his desire to go right up and fight the enemy, he now began thinking of ways to fight without a direct assault, as it seemed to him much more fitting to do that. Also, memories of using advanced techniques of the Balance Breaker were now replaced with him using spells that disorientate and damage foes over time instead.

After he finished, he washed his smaller, more dainty hands and went downstairs to have a small snack. As he went down the stairs, the cold sensation from before returned as his skin softened and tanned itself a bit, becoming nice and peachy.

"There is that cold again... Are there any opened windows left? But my feet aren't cold despite the fact that I don't even wear my socks... I am sure it will pass if I ignore it. I mean, until a second ago I was fine.", he thought as he buttoned up his dress shirt.

However as he walked, his walk began to change as he started to shake his hips, which started now to grow a bit, as he put one foot in front of each other. Also, his black pants continued to lighten as they became a dark grey color as they began climbing up his legs, now exposing half of his calves.

As in regards of the game, he pretty much decided to forget about the girl he couldn't remember, as he saw it as a distraction... not that he will remember her anyway soon enough. And there was something else he was forgetting...

"Was I going to ask someone something...? Was it about my health?... I am feeling quite fine though. That shock hurt a little, but it wasn't anything major in comparison to the electric attacks of those magicians... or Akeno-senpai for that matter... Well, I'll just ask Rias once the reception comes back."
15532212222221212221111121.title: He goes to the bathroom

155322122222212122211111211.content:
Once in the kitchen, he initially wanted to go for a desert. Irina and Asia practiced doing some desert mochi last night and his mom, taking some inspiration from Rias, made some fruit tarts as well. But there was a thought which made him not desire either.

"As good as either of these sounds, I must look for something else. I must keep my figure after all, and not to mention I don't want to put on any excess fat."

As soon as he thought that, his hips expanded once again, as beside his now larger pelvis, some fat was gathering on his sides as well as they stretched his boxers and pants a little.

He then checked the cabinets around the kitchen to see if there was something else. There were some salty snacks around, but none seemed like what he wanted to eat. He then checked the pantry and inside was surprised to see something he never saw before in there: a bag of kombu chips. He picked it up and looked at the description on the package. It said it has been fried and seasoned with sugar, but it said it still packed a lot of nutrients and were a great source of dietary fibers and was great to break down sugars that were normally indigestible.

While eating some algae was something that Issei would never eat on its own, he considered it a lot more now. Before, he also wanted to keep himself fit and healthy, but he would compromise from time to time whenever the girls wanted to give him something. That still applied now, but he seemed a lot more conscious about his weight than before though.

He took one chip from the bag and when he bit into it... he was surprised to find out how good it was.

"Wow, these are really good!", he said out loud as he took another one. "If the nutritious part about these is true, then I should buy these much more often... This nutty flavour combined with the sweetness and sourness really make them delicious! I would take these over a normal bag of chips any day."

He took the a few more, and slowly he ate them as he looked outside. As he did, his arms slimmed down, becoming slim, but still toned. Normally, he would cry seeing his muscles he earned so hard after Tannin's training and then some, but when he looked at them, he seemed oddly pleased with how they looked, also admiring his now manicured hands.

Outside, it seemed the rain wasn't pouring as hard as before. There were still thunders roaring, but it surely looked like an improvement.

"Looks like it's not as bad anymore. Maybe it is safe now to charge up my phone now.", he thought as he eat another chip before closing the bag and putting it back in the pantry. As much as he would've liked to eat the entire bag, he wanted to have some for later. And maybe even sharing them with Rias or Akeno, as they also were preoccupied with their figures.

He then took a green tea drink from the fridge and drank from it as his waist was slowly starting to compress.

"Hah... Nothing better for digestion than some green tea after some kombu.", he smiled to himself.

After another gulp, he put the bottle back in the fridge and went back to his room.
155322122222212122211111211.title: Something healthy

1553221222222121222111112111.content:
Iasai took his phone laying on the bed, not noticing that its dark-blue cover was turning violet. He then took his charger and sat on a chair next to the socket.

"Sensei said I should charge my phone after the rain dims down a little... But I don't know if it's safe yet. The storm doesn't seem to stop anytime soon...", he thought. But then a he felt a bit down, upon noticing his behavior.

"What is wrong with me? I am supposed to be a lot more confident and I am fidgeting over a socket that might zap me... As much as I don't want to get hurt over something like this, I still must be more brave in my actions... Just as the girls are with their advances..."

Upon getting to the last part, Iasai's mind started to wanted off to the girls, remembering the times they tried to get more intimate with him. As he was thinking, his seating was starting to feel a lot more cushy as his ass was starting to get inflate, getting bigger with each thought. With his lower body growing, his pants became tighter and tighter as his thighs went through one more growth spurt and became large, but also toned, albeit not as muscular as they one were.

"... I really need to step up my game. I mean, when they are trying to get closer to me, the first thing I do is panic and get flustered... It's quite infuriating." As he continued his line of thought, his pants turned a silver color as they were now just below his knees, exposing his new calves. Another thing that happened was that his dress shirt lost its collar as together with his T-shirt were starting to lower themselves, exposing his collarbone.

"I must try and get more assertive. I am Iasuai Hyoudou, Pawn of Rias Gremory. I must be more bold!"

He then put the charger in the socket with confidence and unsurprisingly, he didn't end up electrocuting himself.

"Well, you look at that. Seems there was no need to panic after all. I must be like this more often.", he smiled to himself.

Iasuai waited for a few minutes for his phone to charge, before writing a message to Rias to tell about what happened.

"I am sure you know by now, but there was a blackout. Sensei turned on the backup generator for the house on, so we have power again. But there is no signal yet, so I can't call you yet. We will meet after classes." He took a glance at his message and felt it seemed to formal and uninteresting, so with a devious smile, he also wrote: "I can't wait for you to come back. I may need an "examination" to see if I am still feeling sick. We might even need a "nurse" to come as well. See ya later!" And then he sent it, with a sly grin on his face.

"Fufufu... This surely is much better. I am sure at least Asia will get flustered about the message..."

His thinking was interrupted however by some pressure in his abdomen, which made him raise an eyebrow.

"Do I need to use the bathroom already? But I just went not that long ago and I didn't drink much of that tea... Oh well, it's nature's call so..."

He then left the phone on his desk and went towards the bathroom as the material of his pants was starting to become softer.
1553221222222121222111112111.title: Recharging the phone

15532212222221212221111121111.content:
At Kuoh Academy, Rias was just finishing one of her classes along with Akeno. As soon as tey exited the classroom, were joined by Asia, who came up to them regarding the blackout.

"How is Ise-san? Did Something happen during the blackout?"

"Not as far as Azazel said. He turned on the emrgency generator that we had and said Ise was fine when he called him. But his phone died and had to wait until the storm died down a bit, so that there was no risk to get electrocuted.", replied Rias.

"But still... I haven't seen a storm like this in a long time. It reminds me of a thypoon a little.", said Akeno, while looking outside. "Fortunately it isn't. I checked the weather report, and they said that by the time we end our classes, the rain should stop."

"I can't help but feel a bit bad for Ise. First that tiredness from last night, and now this? We should comfort him when we get home..."

"Yes... I think there is no reception yet as even ours is a bit jumbled up. He must be bored out of his mind by now..."

Just then, Rias received a message. Knowing the circumstances, she immediately knew it was Issei and opened it. She, Akeno and Asia read the message. They were happy to know that nothing happened, but couldn't help but blush when they read the last part.

"T-That's a bit bold... Even for Ise..."

"Ara ara, seems like our little Pawn is starting to grow... Fufufufu", giggled Akeno.

"I-I am happy that Ise-san seems more open... But it is a little sudden."

"Yes... I wonder where the "nurse" part came from, but if I were to guess, he may have gotten the idea from the time we took care of him before... Still, to ask something llike this seems a little too uch coming from- Eh?"

Rias was confused when her eyes darted back to the sender of the message. She only saw the "I" at the beginning, so she thought it was Issei. But the name that was on the phone was something completely different.

"Iasuai? What's that name?", asked the hedhead as the othe girls looked at the phone at were now as bewildered as her regarding the matter.

"Uh, Rias... Did you wrote down Ise's name wrong? That's a pretty far cry from it though..."

"No, I haven't... I-I don't know how it changed like that..."

"Maybe you pressed something by accident. The family name is still listed as "Hyoudou".", said Asia.

"Maybe... I'll rewrite it..."

After changing the name on the phone, the three went to meet the others and discuss about their plans for today. Although rias was starting to feel like something was off...

Back at home, Iasuai went back to the bathroom and pulled down his pants and boxers, but this time, the need to sit on the toilet was much stronger and thus, he sat down. He didn't hink it was any problem with doing this as he was alone and was also starting to feel more comfortable this way.

"There was some pressure, but there I don't recall drinking enough for me to need to use the restroom so quicky. I wonder why...", he wondered as his speech pattern was getting more complex.

As he sat there, his rear continued to inflate, making the sitting feel more cushy. As for the pressure he was feeling, it was in reality his waist caving in. It became a lot thinner, but despite the loss of mass in the region, it still was a bit toned, although it wasn't visible too much right now.

After se sat down for another minute, and seeing that there wasn't much of a reason to come as the pressure was not almost gone, he put back on his clothes. His proportions were nearly done, but he still needed a little more time for them to reach their final size. His groin was feeling a little tight now due to the fact that hid thighs and his tighter pants were making his manhood a little uncomfortable, and also made him a bit aroused. And f it wasn't enough, his own red boxers became tighter on him, as they began to get silkier as well. But he decided to ignore the feeling, as he compared it to the pressure he felt earlier, and deducted it would go away eventually.

After washing his hands, he wanted to leave, but a few bangs fell on his face. When he looked in the mirror, his hair was now a light brown, much brighter than his original dark color. But he was a distracted with something else isntead...

"Damn.. I didn't realize my hair was this messy. I need to- Hmm?" His thoughts were interrupted when he noticed something on the counter.
15532212222221212221111121111.title: In the bathroom again

choices: He receives a message from Rias
155322122222212122211111211111.content:
There was a large, pink bow on the counter next to the sink. But other than the fact that it appeared out of nowhere, there was something else that bothered Iasuai.

"Who does this belong to? It can be Xenovia's or Koneko's that's for sure. Rias and Asia... they do wear bows at times, but not something this big... Is this some sort of replacement for Rossweisse-san? She did use one to tie up her hair... And speaking of hair..."

When he looked back in the mirror, the length of his hair was now around his shoulder blades, and while some of it was neatly kept, there was a bang that was falling on his face, along with some wild hair here and there.

"I really need to brush my hair..."

He then took a dark-pink brush that was on the counter, that he assumed was either belonging to his mom or Rias, but he was slowly thinking that it belonged in fact to him. As he was taking care of his mane, the tips of the bangs that framed his face started to curl as he brushed them. Slowly, the curls were becoming a lot more prominent, so in the end, they would resemble two small cylinders. The hairstyle he settled for was a neatly done, with some unkempt bangs here and there to give some uniqueness, other than the two large curls.

"Hmm... This looks very nice. I wonder if Rias will appreciate my new hairstyle...", he laughed a little before his face started to itch.

Not knowing where the itch came from, he began washing his face, while still thinking about the girls, playing with his hair. As he did that, his face became rounder as his lips got a bit plumper and gained a small pout. His cheekbones grew higher while his nose and ears became smaller. Lastly, his eyes became bigger as they changed color from brown to green his small eyebrows enhancing their beauty.

After he dried himself up, he looked at himself with a hint of pride upon seeing his reflection.

"Well, while I may not be the fittest of the group like Xenovia or Irina, I sure am getting a lot of points for looking good. After all, it would be a shame if my smarts and my Devil abilities were the only thing I would be blessed with.", he said in an higher octave as he posed a little. Without noticing, the buttons on his dress shirt completely disappeared as its color was starting to turn from white to yellow and the material was becoming tougher and thicker. "But I must be level-headed. After all, Rias fell in love with Iasukai, the boy who is perverted, kind and caring. I surely do not need prideful in the profile.", he giggled a little.

But before leaving, he look again at the bow and then remembered something.

"Did I leave my bow here? Huh... I must've forgotten with the black out and all..."

He then put the pink accessory on top of his head, thinking how good it suits him before leaving.

Most of his knowledge about the Boosted Gear's power was mostly gone by now. He remembered the basics, and was able to enter Balance Breaker, but with a lot more effort than before. This was because his abilities were now distributed in other areas. His magic compatibility was much higher, giving him the possibility to use a vast array of spells. Combined with his new found dexterity and knowledge about plants and chemicals, he was able to inflict curses, various ailments, perform some healing, and even summon illusory soldiers that somewhat resembled a combination of robots and puppets for some reason.

Inside the Boosted Gear, Ddraig was just waking up.

"Hah... I haven't slept like this in a while. Forgive me partner, but it seems I haven't really recovered after all the things that happened recently. With all that fighting yesterday... and that blasted theme song... Forgive me, I know I said I was mostly over it, but I swear that bastard Fallen Angel is making new lyrics for another season of that show... Hmm?"

He expected Issei to respond back to him, or at least sigh, but instead he was mt with silence.

"Ise? Is something wrong? Why aren't you saying anything? I know you do like the show, but you can't possibly be mad for just that?" The lack of response is starting to worry the Divine Dragon a little. "Ise? What happened? I swear I- What?! The link is closed off?! How?!"

Indeed, there was no longer a way for Ddraig to talk to Ise anymore, which greatly worried him. He then looked in his memories a bit to see any recent events that must've cause it, seeing something that surprised him.

"He got electrocuted? How come I didn't notice that? Any physical damage should've triggered my awakening... Wait. Don't tell me that's the reason the link is closed... That's impossible. There's no way something that simple could've broken it. Is there something else that happened?"

He then looked through the other events that happened today as he was sleeping, and some of the things he saw didn't make much sense.

"Why would Ise watch a show like that? He never mentioned liking scientific programs... And since when does he like eating algae? And what's with that comment at the end of that message?"

Ddraig then tried connecting himself to his senses. While he couldn't link with his mind, he managed with the rest of his senses. He then used Ise's vision to try and figure out if something happened.

"Nothing out of the ordinary... We all still at home, there doesn't seem to be any imminent threat, and that blasted rain is still outside... I don't get it. The link is blocked by something, but there doesn't seem to be.... Wait, why is he walking like a woman?", he thought as he noticed the walk. "He walks just like Gremory. Was it some sort of mind attack by someone to make him act the way he is? I must've missed something."

He went back to check his memories, and noticed a new segment, of him before leaving he bathroom was added. Initially, there seemed to be nothing wrong with it, except for the longer than usual hair, until he reached the part where he checked himself in the mirror. At that point, the Dragon froze.

"No... way... Please for the love of the Great Red, tell me I am still sleeping..."
155322122222212122211111211111.title: A pink bow

1553221222222121222111112111111.content:
Iasukai returned to his room, wanting to see if he received another message. He didn't notice that it changed a bit while he ate and went to the bathroom again. There was a vanity mirror in the back of the room that wasn't there before. While Rias and Asia did sleep with him quite often, they still had their own rooms, so normally there shouldn't be the need of one there.... at least not yet. Also a Kuoh Academy female uniform was now hanging next to the dresser which became slightly bigger as well. Inside, most clothes have already changed. While there still were jeans and pants in there, there was quite a big number of skirts, leggings and a few dresses here and there. There also multiple shirts and tops which would belong to a girl as well.Normally, someone would think they belong to Rias, but it wasn't the case this time. They soon would belong to Iasukai.

Finally, the box with various "potions" became fuller as the amount in them doubled. This signifies that Iasukai's knowledge on making them was growing.

He then took a seat next to his phone and saw that it was about half-way charged and that there indeed was a message for him from Rias. It escaped him that its covering was now a dark shade of pink. And besides, he was busy with a back pain that came to him around the same time he went to the bathroom.

"My back feels a little stiff... I should try and fix it."

He then pressed on his back as his arms finished changing, becoming slim and strong as his shoulders became rounder and smaller. When the pain subsided, his back was now arched which gave him a bit more mobility.

"There you go. Now let's read the message."

"I already now of the incident Ise. Azazel told me about the situation, but I am nonetheless happy that you are fine. I regret not being there to keep you company. Anyways, I will return with the others at around 6PM. The rain should stop by then as well. And by the way, regarding the last part... I know you liked us nursing you before, but let's not jump the horse yet Ise. We will still ensure you a great afternoon."

Iasukai giggled a bit at the message as his voice went up by another octave.

"Oh Rias, you are still so innocent..."

He then texted her back, making sure to add his own little twist to the message to get another reaction from her. He loved to tease her from time to time as it would pay her back for the times she did that to him. As he wrote down his message, his red T-shirt completely lost its sleeves as the color was turning pink. On top of it, the material became much more silkier, almost looking like it's trying not to irritate him...

He then sent the message and smirked a bit. He then left the phone on the desk, but when he stood up, he was confused as to why his pants didn't let him to move too much.

"Now that's odd... Did I put on weight? Nah, maybe they just feel tight right now, I'm sure.", he mumbled to himself.

His pants, which were now resting above his knees and here tightly hugging his thighs, were now going through a major change. Their legs were fusing together at their seams, as they started to resemble a skirt.
1553221222222121222111112111111.title: He receives a message from Rias

15532212222221212221111121111112.content:
Iasukai opened up his computer, curious to see if the Internet has returned. Upon a small inspection, he found out that it worked, but certain features such as Youtube and Messenger not working yet.

"Well, it was to be expected. It was impossible for everything to work. I don't have anything in particular I want to look up yet right now... Oh, maybe I should check the photos from our trip."

After closing the Internet, he went into his photo folder and opened up a file with their trip to a water park they went last week. It was a big location that they managed to have it all for themselves with a little bit of help from Sirzecks. They wanted to have a day to have fun without their usual missions or being chased by fans of the "Oopai Dragon". But there were two big differences about Iasukai since the last time he checked the page, other than his appearance. The first one was that in the pictures he looked a lot more energetic, excited and flustered when dealing with the attempts of the girls to seduce him. Now, he seemed more mature, calm and a tad sly and playful in them. And also, instead of wearing regular trunks, he was wearing a hot-pink bikini bottom.

As he was looking though the photos, his T-shirt continued to change. What was once his sleeves became just two thin straps that held his top as the material became a lot smoother and silky as the pink became more visible. Also, his former shirt became almost completely yellow as the material became cashmere.

He then licked his lips a little as he saw the girls and himself interact.

"Well, the day sure was memorable... Fufufu... To think even Rias and Akeno would get embarrassed by a little affection... They usually tease me as well from time to time, but whenever they are the ones that are on the receiving end, they just become scared cats. They really need to take some lessons from Xenovia in terms of trying to put on a calm face... But regardless, they all still look gorgeous as always..."

As Iasukai admired the girls and he got a bit naughty with his thoughts, his figure finished changing with his hips becoming large and alluring and his waist waspish as his rear became a large heart-shape that would make most girls envy of it. He now looked almost like a model, and could rival Rias and Akeno in terms of curves. But there were a few more changes for him to even start comparing himself with the two. Also, in the photos, his updated figure was now present alongside a bikini top that had a rectangular hole in the middle that matched his bottoms.

"But enough of that... I should keep my fantasies a bit more discrete. I am pretty sure even Gya-kun could see what I am thinking..."

Back at school, the girls were having lunch together. With Gasper being yet too shy to go out and eat in the cafeteria, Kiba went with him to eat somewhere more secluded. The girls were discussing about their day, their homework, and especially about Issei's bad day.

"Man, Ise really got short end of the stick... Tired as heck, stuck at home becasue of the rain, and now a blackout..."

"Yes...Maybe his karma got up to him in a way."

"Don't say that Koneko-chan.", pouted Irina "He wasn't nowhere as perverted in public since almost a month."

"Now that you mention it... He seemed to give a lot more restraint recently...", remarked Ravel.

"Maybe it was due to all that happened recently. I mean, we just put an end to the Hero Faction, and now Rivezim shows up to cause trouble... He didn't get much time to have his little fantasies to develop..."

"I agree with Rias. After the promotion test, we didn't get that much time of relaxation. And Ise especially."

"Ise-san has really been fighting a lot lately. I wonder if he is overexerting himself..."

"Don't worry Asia. We will just do our best to have him relax and have a great time. Just like we did at the water park.", said Rias.

The girls all nodded, being more than eager to show the man they love some affection and offer him some much needed pampering.

Just then, Rias heard her cellphone buzz.

"I got a message... I wonder if it is from Ise."

"The last one was a bit more bold than I could imagine. I wonder what made him write that."

"What do you mean Asia?", asked Xenovia as she and the rest went to look at the message on the phone, a hint of curiosity in all of them.
15532212222221212221111121111112.title: Checking his computer

155322122222212122211111211111121.content:
Much to her relief, Rias saw that the name listed this time was indeed Issei's this time and not some weird one like last time. She then lowered the phone a little as the other girls were getting a bit to close to her, so that she would have a bit more space as the others spread out a little.

"I am sorry if you got flustered because of the last message. But you must know by now how much you, Akeno and the others tease me at times. I don't have anything against it, but you should expect the same treatment as well... and since you like to "show-off" so much, how come you get flustered whenever things get serious? I feel a bit cheated with that... Anyways, nothing much happened, but I found something to do in the meantime. Still, I could use some fun tonight. After all, I need some "sunshine" after all this rain... And the nurse thing... could be an option... I'll be waiting for you!"

The girls, especially Asia, Koneko and Irina got a small blush on their cheeks as they read the message.

"Well...", started Koneko. "It is true that we mess with Senpai from time to time, but I never thought he would put things this way..."

"But it's not like we lose our cool every time we get intimate with Ise, right?"

"Speak for yourself Xenovia! I almost lose my breath whenever we are in public!", exclaimed Irina. "When we're alone... it may work. But in public I turn into my 12 year old self!"

"I agree... I also feel like I would melt whenever we go on a date... It may not be from others watching as much as having Ise-kun display his manly side in my case..."

They were expecting the others to continue the discussion, but they were surprised to see Rias, Asia and Ravel still looking at the message. Ravel had a confused look on her face while the other two looked a bit concerned.

"What's up? Is something wrong?", asked Akeno.

"Is it tied to that nurse thing? Does Ise want us to dress as nurses again? I mean, I don't mind it."

"M-Me neither. It was a bit revealing... But I want to show him how much my cooking has improved..."

"It's not necessary that...", sad Ravel. "But there is something off with how he signed himself."

The others were confused by this until they looked at the message again and were left utterly lost. It wasn't rare for Issei to sign himself on his messages, but this time, instead of his name, there was another one: "Iasuka Hyoudou."

"Huh? What is this?", asked Koneko. "Why does Senpai's name is written like that?"

"I don't know.", replied Rias. "This also happened last time. Back there, his name was written wrong on my phone. It also was a weird sounding name, but it wasn't this one... I don't know what to think of this..."

"Me neither... I am relieved that Ise-san's name is written correctly on Rias-nee-sama's phone this time. But it is really confusing as to why this happened..."

The girls got confused a slightly worried, until Xenovia remembered something.

"Maybe it's just Azazel-sensei pulling a prank on us again. Remember when he hacked into our phones?"

"Oh, I remember that...", said Akeno in an unamused phone. "That guy started writing messages and sent them as if we were the ones writing them... I had a lot of things to clarify after he said I enjoy soap operas."

"It really seems to be something he would do... Not to mention that the last messages may have come from him..."

As the girls began to suspect Azazel being behind the current situation, Rias still couldn't help but worry a little.

"I just hope it is just Azazel's prank...", she thought.

Back home, Iasuka was still looking at the photos when he started to cough a little. In response to it, he started to rub his neck.

"This is odd... I felt weird all day, and now this... Maybe it's because of the weather... Or maybe I am really getting sick..."

As he rubbed his neck, the bulge that was once there was now gone as his voice became feminine and also a bit alluring. Also, his clothes finished changing. He was now wearing a pink camisole with a yellow sweater over it with his camisole poking a bit underneath the sweater as their neckline plunged a lot, showing a lot of his torso. His pants lost their pockets and fused completely, becoming a white skirt. As for his boxers, they became made out of silk as the color was changing to pink and were slowly retracting as well.

As fast as the soreness in his neck came, it went away just as fast, which confused Iasuka a little.

"So many odd phenomena happened today... I must ask the others or Sensei if there is something wrong with me... Whatever, I can just relax with the girls first. I doubt it's contagious."
155322122222212122211111211111121.title: It came from Issei
