While he preferred shows with more girls than guys whenever it came down to his "personal time" ones, he still enjoyed it if there was a male protagonist here and there. Right now, that idea was gone, and was now more pleased with only-female casts instead.

In fact, despite all the changes, he was still into girls.

While there wasn't any scenes that were going overboard, he was enthralled by the way it was presented, with the girls showing off their best "assets". "Okay... Let's have some fun.", he smirked as he licked his lips.

He already admitted to himself that some of the scenes in the show were bizarre , funny or ridiculous, but even so, he liked it for the serious tone it had as much as the scenes. Rias said I should take it in my own stride and that's exactly what I am going to do. I know I will figure out all of the Boosted Gear's secrets in the end. Until then, I'll just use my spells, potions and mind games until then.", he said to himself with a smile. "After all, I am Iaruka Hyoudou. I am the Oopai Dragon, one of the school's divas... Fufufu... It's quite the oxymoron if you put those two titles together. I wonder what the girls at school would do if they find out my hidden side... But a lot of people are counting on me, so I better not disappoint them... But until that time, I should enjoy myself while I can."

He then went back to his show just in time to see the girls in the show try the suit on as well. Upon seeing them, his silky boxers finished changing into a pair of panties as his breasts became B-cups. Also, his groin began to tingle as a cavity was forming in his abdomen.

"It does. Really, Ise needs to stop trying to pamper us. I will, without a doubt enjoy his cooking. But I want to see what is he doing right now. And to make a little surprise. Try not to eat until I come back."

"I-I am coming too then!"

Asia and Akeno followed Rias upstairs, as the three started a small race to his bedroom as the others sighed and waited for their return.
155322122222212122211111211111121111.title: The girls come home

That girl grew up in the pictures and the most recent one, taken not too long ago was of the whole ORC, with her standing where Ise was.

The figure, then turned on the lights.

"In order: I didn't meant to give you a heart attack, I just wanted to play a bit. I always am bold when it comes to this, I just hide it really good. And yes, I waited ever since I heard you get here.", said Haruka. "And Rias, who is "Ise" and why did you think I was this person?"

1553221222222121222111112111111211112.title: Staying downstairs

15532212222221212221111121111112111121.content:
The three girls didn't move as the girl turned on the light. They were filled with confusion, not just for there being a random girl who knew their names in Issei's room, but more as to how she got there, as it would be highly unlikely for Issei to let anyone inside, even if it was someone to nice-looking.

"Well, it is not as if it really matters. I am feeling a bit tired after making a that food downstairs. I need a small drink. I'll go and take some ginger ale. Do you want something?"

"Who... are you?"

"Huh? What do you mean Asia?"

"Don't fool around!", said Rias in a serious tone. "Who are you and where is Ise?"

Akeno was also glaring at the girl with intensity as Asia just looked concerned. But the girl looked at them quizzically as if there was something wrong with them.

"Who is this Ise and what does he have anything to do with me? And you already know my name. It's Haruka. Haruka Hyoudou."

""H-Hyoudou?!"", exclaimed Rias and Akeno in disbelief.

"You two are not making much sense... Did you and Asia drink something from my collection?"

Haruka looked at the box in the back of the room at which the girls looked as well. They didn't remember said box being there, especially since there was a "Warning" label on it.

"I know I keep my elixirs and tonics I made there, but you should know that there is also where I keep my potions if you would call them that."

"P-Potions?"

"Yeah, you know... poisons, concoctions that give other ailments, the usual, and a few new recipes I have been making recently. You never know when you need them in battle."

Just then, Xenovia and the others entered the room, ready to tell Rias about their findings, but stalled when they saw Haruka.

"Oh, perfect timing everyone. Seems like Rias and Akeno drank something from my box and they-"

"A-Are you... Haruka?", asked Irina in disbelief.

"T-Then is it r-really true?"

Haruka looked at the confused girls quite surprised as she gasped a little.

"Don't tell me... You drank something as well?"

"Enough of this!", yelled Rias. "Tell us who you are!"

Despite being a hint of anger in Rias' eyes, Haruka merely sighed before responding.

"I guess a full introduction is in order then... I am Haruka Hyoudou. I am a student at Kuoh Academy, and along with Rias and Akeno, we are named the three beauties of the school. I also am Rias' Pawn as well as the Sekiryuutei. But despite that, I am still a beginner at using the Sacred Gear's power, so I rely on other methods to fight using my high magic pool, like using my concoctions and such. And my dream is to have my own personal harem, be it girls or boys... Is this better?"

The girls froze. They were shocked, confused and afraid that something happened to Issei as the girl didn't seem to lie in her words.

"Hah... You must've drank something that clouded your memories...", sighed Haruka. "Honestly, after that whole fiasco with the truth serum, I thought you stopped trying to take things out of the box without my consent..."

"I-I-I...", was all Rias could muster to say before they were interrupted.
15532212222221212221111121111112111121.title: Reaction

155322122222212122211111211111121111211.content:
A transport circle materialized on the room, with Azazel coming out of it. He took a glance at the confused look of the ORC members, and upon seeing Haruka, he gave a small sigh.

"Nice to meet you today... Sorry Haruka, they snuffed one of your potions by accident. I think it was the one you made last week with Rossweisse... I saw it through a video camera installed in your house."

The girls were ready to ask what was he talking about, when they saw him wink at them, noticing them that he knows what's going on without Haruka noticing.

"Hah... I should've guessed. There was no way the girls I love would act so strange without a reason." Some of the females blushed upon hearing "love", especially Asia, Koneko and Ravel before she continued. "I know I have told them to not mess with my formulas, but I guess I am also a bit responsible for not putting the box away... I will make an antidote right away."

"There is no need. I already made some preparations to solve it back at the club."

"That's great. Just wait for me to get ready and-"

"Actually, I talked with your parents and they will soon come home. You should stay and wait for them."

"Of course... I am sure they are a bit hungry as well. Don't worry, I'll keep some for you too.", smiled Haruka to the girls as they felt a bit awkward, a small trace of red in their cheeks.

"T-Thanks Haruka."

"No problem. Oh, by the way Sensei, please turn off the feed on that camera tonight. Things should get... fun at some point."

There was no way the girls wouldn't get nervous once they saw her smirk as Rias started to fidget at that remark. Azazel gave a small sigh before he opened up the portal for him and the girls.

"Don't worry. I will."

He then waved at her as they left, Haruka getting now ready to wait for her parents.

At the ORC building, once the transport was finished, the girls exploded.

"What was that?! Do you know what's going on Azazel?!"

"Are you behind this? You have to! be"

"Just bring Ise-san back! It feels weird having someone else look at me like that!"

"Who is this Haruka? And why does she says she is a Pawn and-"

"One question at the time.", responded Azazel as he cut them off, with a tired expression. "Yes, I know what happened. And no, this was not something I planed to do. As for bringing Ise back... there is a small snag. Believe it or not, it sounds ridiculous, but is the truth."

"And that is?"

"Haruka is Ise."

At that response, Rias and the others had their lights go away from their eyes, ready to faint any moment, but somehow all stood awake, as Azazel continued.

"It happened just before you left school. Rossweisse called me and said that Ise was gone from the yearbook and that a girl named Haruka was in his place. I checked my files, and there it was, her profile with a full picture of her. I looked at the cameras in your house, and as expected, there she was, making some snacks.... And when I checked the recording from today... I couldn't believe it. Between the start of the blackout and not too long before you guys got home, I saw Ise gradually turn into Haruka... He didn't even notice. It was like things went natural."

"H-How did i-it h-happen?", muttered Rias, not believing what was happening.

"Well... I said that I didn't turn Ise into a girl... but I had in a way a hand in this... Ise's console broke a few days ago, so I gave him a prototype to play games on. One feature on it was to bring the characters from the game in real life. Just when the lights went out, a shock hit the console and zapped it along with Ise. He didn't suffer any physical damage, but there was a problem with the system... He was playing a game where Haruka was one of the characters. I guess that when the lightning striked, it activated the summon sequence for her. But since some circuits broke down, and Ise was in direct contact with it... it transferred the summon program by using him as base for it. That's why the Haruka that exists now is not only having a different life than the one in the game, but it also adapted to Ise's life as well, including having the Boosted Gear and being your Pawn... I am guessing the reality shift thing is some sort of secondary effect..."

The girls couldn't believe it. But as much as they wanted to punish Azazel for this, they knew that he wasn't actually responsible for this, and instead tried to calm their nerves for a few minutes.
155322122222212122211111211111121111211.title: Azazel teleports

1553221222222121222111112111111211112111.content:
"Does Rossweisse-san know about this?"

"Yes. I have told her just before I came for you. She was also dumbstruck, but managed to swallow it. It seems all beings that are not quite "human" are immune to this."

"So Haruka is a game character... How does Ise always get himself in all these weird situations?"

"I am not going to ask what kind of game it was the one she came from, but I am happy she is mature and calm... I wonder how will she respond to this..."

"We shouldn't tell her. This is something temporary."

"Indeed. Just turn Ise back already. I know you have a device for that."

"Well... It is a bit more complicated.", said Azazel as he pinched the bridge of his nose. "I have a gender switch gun, but that will only turn Haruka into a boy, not into Ise."

"T-Then how are you going to turn him back?"

"I need to check that console and see what happened to it. It was the cause of the transformation after all. But... depending on what exactly is broken and how much, it will take a while..."

The girls looked at him in shock as Ravel meekly asked back:

"A-And how much do you think it will take?"

"Well, if only the summon program is damaged maybe a week, but since that is the best case scenario, we might get two weeks out of it."

"Two weeks?!", yelled at the girls in unison.

"I-Is there no way to make it quicker?", asked Xenovia.

"Maybe it is, but it is too risky. We don't want to end up with an Ise with Haruka's personality or something like that right?... Judging by how things are, the world might see Haruka as someone who is already part of this world. She has Ise's life after all... We will have to continue acting normal until I repair the console"

The others were thinking how to deal with the situation, until they remembered something. A mixture of embarrassment and dread took over them as it dawned on them.

"H-Hold on! T-That means I and Asia have to sleep... with Haruka?!"

"E-Eh?! I-I don't think I-I can!"

"I can't have my special talks with a girl!"

"S-Senpai is H-Haruka-san... W-What should I do...?"

"There's no way I can spend time with her! She's just my opposite!"

"M-My love can't be pure if it is directed towards a girl..."

"W-What should I do? Ise-sama is my hero, but he can't be like this..."

"Um, sorry to interrupt...", said Azazel. "But shouldn't you worry more about the "special night" Haruka mentioned that you promised her?"

The girls turned to stone. They couldn't imagine how will tonight go... Or they were too afraid to...

"What will you do is none of my business. I will turn off the cameras in the house just as I promised. As much as it is a show for me, I can't just to that to Ise. I'll come tomorrow for the console."

"W-Wait. What should we do now?"

"Like I said, I will not butt in into this."

"You made the console! You have to owe us something!"

"And you could've told me about this sooner, when there was a way to reverse this. I saw on my phone how Ise's name gradually changed. I thought my phone was glitching out, before I rewrote it correctly. What is your excuse? There was seven of you, and I am sure you just thought I was messing with your phones. None of you thought of calling me about this either."

The rest couldn't say anything at this point. For them to be scolded by Azazel was something they didn't expect to happen. As the Fallen Angel began to search on replacement parts for the broken console, the girls returned home... not sure what to do except to play their part... and what to expect of this afternoon.
1553221222222121222111112111111211112111.title: Solution

1553221222222121222111112111111211112111.content:
The next week and a half was surely unique for the ORC members. Unsurprising, Issei's parents and the rest of the school didn't remember him, and instead knew only Haruka existing. With her politeness, maturity and knowledge, she was a hit for the girls, always admiring her alongside Rias and Akeno, while the guys, particularly Matsuda and Motohama really wished to pursue her. But she was firm in having herself choose who should she date, and even that thought was mostly obscured by her attachment to the ORC members... even if they had difficulty to keep up the act of always having her as a member.

Kiba and Gasper weren't that distressed with the situation. Other than Haruka's teasing and their awkwardness around her when doing more private activities such as studying, they got along with her pretty well, with Kiba in a sense, linking her to Rias. Ddraig, while initially panicked over what happened to Issei, upon learning from Azazel that the situation is reversible, calmed down and decided to observe Haruka. While he was disappointed that she couldn't hear him, thus making her unable to use more of the Sacred Gear's power, he was impressed of how meticulous she was with her spells and potions. But he still admitted to himself that he missed Issei... Not to mention that her likeness of girls and the fact that she was still called the Oppai Dragon confused him a lot... Rossweisse, while shocked and concerned at first, began liking Haruka as she also liked to study magic as much as her. But despite their lessons together and learning more spells from her was, she still waited for Issei to come back to normal.

As the rest of the girls... things sure got uncomfortable.

Koneko and Ravel were practically screaming inside and were ready to run whenever they were alone with Haruka. Whenever her "playful" side came out and started to tease them and try to get intimate, for the sake of not blowing off their cover, they had to endure it. Even if that meant for them to have their faces red as they can get. Even if it was mostly "harmless", they still couldn't help but starting to get some fantasies in the end... which they tried to erase from their minds... at least until Issei came back.

Xenovia and Irina also had a lot of troubles. While they didn't mind shopping with Haruka, they found it quite boring, as they would rather go to a karaoke bar or to an arcade with Issei rather than just walking through the mall. And while they loved her cooking, the lack of protein, at least in Xenovia's case, was surely a big downside for her, as she considered to need to eat more hardy to keep up with her training. As for their private moments, Irina was unable to have too many of them. She thanked God that she could use the excuse of her becoming a Fallen Angel to get away, as she could handle Issei's perversion much better than Haruka's teasing any day of the week. And Xenovia, while not as flustered as her juniors, she nonetheless felt awkward spending time with Haruka the same way she did with Issei.

As for Rias, Asia and Akeno... they sure got the worst out of it. Due to their constant behavior of sleeping together with Issei before, Haruka wished to do the same. And the three could hardly sleep as not only were they sleeping with someone they barely knew, but whenever she moved around in bed and her breasts started to touch them... they could start to understand why Ise had issues sleeping with them before. As for the rest of their free time, they merely spent time with Haruka for the sake of keeping up their cover, mostly thinking about Ise.

And the night when all this started... is something they all wish to forget...

Eventually, Azazel managed to make a device using the console as a base to reverse to process, which brought Issei back, though with no memory of the past week. The girls played it as a result of a device Azazel made which made him lose his memory, which although not too happy with the lie, Azazel supported it.

Today, Issei was ready to go to bed, with the rest of the girls joining him.

"Aren't you all a bit more clingy this week? I mean, I understand Akeno-san sneaking in at times, but it is rare for all of you to come to my bed."

"Well, we are feel like we didn't to that enough Ise-sama."

"And we wanted to have a good night's sleep and I feel here is the best place for that."

"Um... While I appreciate that you think that, you sure seem a lot more eager to be with me. Are you sure you are not hiding something? I mean, a week is a week. A lot can happen."

"Don't worry about it Ise. There was nothing of importance that should concern you."

"I-Indeed. Nothing major happened."

"Now let's just go to sleep. It is pretty late and I just want to snuggle in."

Issei began blushing at Akeno's comment and was ready to turn off the lights, when he remembered something.

"By the way, did all of you came to my bed when I lost my memory?"

"Why do you ask?"

"Well, I had this dream for a few days. It seems like a memory, but it's a bit strange that it comes back from time to time."

"A dream?"

"Yes, it was with all of you and me lying in the bed... and then there are lot of pauses, as I see just fragments of something... It didn't look different than what we are usually doing whenever we go to sleep.... but you girls seemed a lot more flustered and the weirdest part was that I was a girl... I had huge breasts, long curly hair, and you called me Haruka... Is it weird?"

The girls stopped for a second before they yelled back: "No! Not at all!" in unison, as Ise blinked in confusion.

"T-There was nothing special that time period! I-I am sure it was just a weird dream. Let's just go to sleep now!"

"O-Okay..."

Ise jumped on the bed as the girls went to their usual "clinging spot", but he noticed they seemed like they were panicking a little as well. Before they started to fall asleep.

"I wonder if nothing really happened.... Well Sensei, Kiba and Ddraig there was nothing wrong... I guess it really is a weird fantasy... I remember this Haruka being a character in that game. But I wonder why did I put her in my place... Well, I am sure it's nothing...", he mumbled to himself as he went to sleep.

Meanwhile, Rias ans Akeno and the others already made plans for tomorrow to have Azazel wipe the dream out of his mind...
1553221222222121222111112111111211112111.title: Ise's dream

1553221222222122.content: Does the girl come from Gessen?
1553221222222122.title: No

15532212222221221221.content:
Issei was having quite a boring day today. After another failed attempt at peaking at the girls ruined by the kendo club and Matsuda and Motohama's stupidity, he was currently walking home alone. The girls all went to the mall to do some shopping, and as much as he wanted to join them, they wanted what they will buy to be a surprise for when they would come back, thus making him be alone until the girls or his parents came back home.

So Issei didn't had any plan whatsoever. He could play a video game or read an eroge manga, but today he felt a little drained after being told off for the millionth time by the kendo club.

"Jeez, why can't they just leave me be with that? It's not like I was looking at them in particular, and I am pretty sure Rias, Asia and Akeno-senpai told them it's not a problem. I can't really explain my situation, but to be honest, it's getting a little on my nerves. They must think I should be a girl like them... all mannered, and against all the sexy stuff..."

He tried a number of times to get their point of view. But because of them, most of the student body still labeled him as a pervert. He could still remember that one time at the school festival when he was beaten just because he cosplayed as a zombie.

"Honestly... I can never get why they should get that serious with something like this? Don't they consider a man's feelings?"

He was grateful Rias and the other weren't like this. He wasn't against politeness to important or older people, and he hated when others tried to ignore or abuse someone's feelings. But he couldn't help but feel like he was done and injustice. He was a pervert, but never disrespectful towards girls.

"What's wrong with admiring a girl's breasts? Even they must acknowledge if another girl is beautiful or not..."

When he got close to his house, he could faintly hear a small beeping noise coming from inside. He sighed as he started to sweat a little.

"I nearly forgot that Sensei said he'll come over to test another invention of his... First a clone ray, then that UFO, and there's also that gender change ray gun... Whatever it is, I hope it's nothing targeting me specifically..."

"What's wrong partner? Scared of one of Azazel's toys?", asked Ddraig from the Longnus. "Given all that happened until now , and all that we faced, I am amazed you still fret over this."

"I know, but... I think even you agree that I am the recipient more often than not of Sensei's inventions, correct?"

"I... am not going to argue with you there. But things always turn up okay in the end, don't they?"

"Right..."

Given that he was more often than not the unfortunate target of Azazel's inventions, he could only pray that if something is to happen to him, at the very least it would be enjoyable... Although he wanted nothing to happen in actuality.

After shaking his head, he went and opened the door. For a brief second nothing seemed to happen, as he took off his shoes. The second immediately after, he was engulfed in bright light.

"Damn it, Sensei! All the time! Why always me!", yelled Issei as he disappeared along with the light, leaving only his shoes behind.
15532212222221221221.title: Yes

155322122222212212211.content:
Once the light faded away, Issei found himself on what appeared to be a beach. While he hasn't been in a while to the coast, he definitely didn't recognize the place, and on top of it, judging by the Sun and the temperature, it was as if it was summer again. The weirdest part however was that Issei was in his dark-green swimming trunks, his school clothes now gone.

"Sensei! Why does this always happen to me?!... Well, I escaped that gender change ray... but still!", cursed the boy loudly. "But where am I anyway? And why am I in my swimsuit? Was that teleportation device or something? But why is it hot like it is in summer? Hey Ddraig, do you know what's going on?... Ddraig?"

He was starting to get worried as to why the dragon wasn't answering him. He feared the worst, thinking that somehow the link between them was damaged by whatever sent him here, but just before he could try to use Balance Breaker, he heard someone coming from the forest behind him. As much as he wanted to make sure everything was fine, he didn't want to scare anyone with his armor in case it was a regular human, so he decided to wait for the moment.

What he saw stunned him. In front of him, coming from the forest, was a beautiful girl, around his age with white, snowy skin and light blue eyes. He short silver hair was tied in the back by a white bow with blue stripes and she had a blue swimsuit with the bikini top having white polka dots and a black ribbon in the front while the skirt-like garment she wore was covering the white bottoms she was wearing, with a few white frills completing the design. But it wasn't the girl's impressive chest that drew Issei's attention, but the fact that he knew who the girl was.

"Oh... I am sorry that I interrupted you... I thought I heard someone talking and I was curious who it was... Are you perhaps a tourist?", asked the girl politely.

"Uh... Y-Yeah... It is the first time I came here... and since I didn't see anyone around I thought it was deserted...", said Issei as he tried to come up with a story.

"The same goes for me as well. This isn't a regular place for people to come, given that it is in quite a remote location... I believe I heard you yelling. Did something happen?"

"N-No... it's nothing important, don't worry about it... Haha... Uh, so are you alone?"

"No, I am here with a few of my friends."

"Do... you mind if I come with you? It is a bit lonely here and I don't want to spend the whole day on my alone. Only if you want of course..."

"Well... I suppose you can join us... But some of the rest might consider it strange to invite a boy... But I guess that being alone here would be quite depressing as well... You can come, but only if you behave yourself."

"U-Understood..."

The girl nodded and began leading the way before she stopped.

"I nearly forgot to ask for your name... Forgive me."

"Don't mention it. My name is Issei."

"Yumi. It is a pleasure to meet you."

Afterward, the two continued walking, with Issei staying a little behind, with a slightly worried expression on his face.

"The name clinches it... This is Yumi from the Senran Kagura series..."
155322122222212212211.title: On a beach

1553221222222122122111.content:
Senran Kagura was a series Issei was introduced to not that long ago. Given the context of beautiful, hot teenage girls in a variety of outfits, with ninja powers, he needed little time to be charmed by them. While he couldn't play the games of the series with the girls or Kiba and Gasper, Azazel was more than happy to partake in enjoying the fanservice. But since Azazel had a few ideas as to how would they be able to interact with the girls, his past record of inventions and the fact that Yumi, the girl Issei was walking with now, was one of the main characters of the series, as the leader of the Gessen team, Issei could only wonder if this was a curse or a blessing.

"Excuse me Issei-san.", said the girl as she looked at the boy. "You seem a little deep in thought. Is something the matter?"

"No, don't worry about it. It's just that I think my Sensei pulled a prank on me."

"A prank?"

"Let's just say that he is the type to joke around a little too much... I would tell you more, but I don't want to get you involved in this mess."

"I see...", said Yumi a bit unsure of what the "mess" was about. "Still, it is unbecoming of a teacher to pull pranks on his pupils."

"I-I think so as well.", replied Issei a bit nervously at Yumi's cold tone. While he was grateful he could see such beauties in real life, due to the fact that not just Yumi, but the rest of the girls of Gessen were very against perverted acts, with only Shiki being the more open one to it. The one he was afraid the most was Yozakura, a girl who was even more strict than Yumi, and acted a lot more like an enforcer of order whenever the leader wasn't around. "She will be a lot more trouble than the girls from the kendo club... Between shinai and armored gauntlets, I would prefer the former hands down... If I was a girl they wouldn't be so mean, but if I am a guy, it's a crime for them... Damn those strict girls..."

As he was thinking that, he didn't notice that all his body hair, except the one on his head suddenly vanished, leaving his skin a little more sensitive to the cold air of the beach. He also didn't see how his height dropped a little, from 5'7 to 5'3, now making him slightly smaller than Yumi.

"So... Are you here alone?"

"No, I am with a few of my friends."

"And how many of you are there right now?

"We are currently four."

"Wait... Just four?", asked Issei, confused, as he always thought all groups were made out of five members.

"I know it is a bit strange just for four of us to be on a beach so far from the city, but we are expecting another group to arrive shortly."

"I see..."

"Also... I know it will be a bit hard… But could you please not stare too much at us? I know we are all girls, but would appreciate if you refrain from any perverted acts.”

“I-I promise…”, said the boy. Despite the promise though, he was suddenly made aware of the situation, and began to take a few peaks at Yumi’s rear, which shook a little through the swimsuit. “Damn it… You just had to go ahead and say that…”

He didn’t notice that his new height made him better see the girl’s butt, as he was a little too preoccupied with the sight at the moment. In the meantime, his hair started to lose its usual spikiness it once had, as it became smoother, and also straightened out a bit.

“As awesome as it is to check these girls out… What’s the deal with one of them not being here? Is the one who’s missing sick or something like that?... Yumi-san sad others should be arriving soon. Maybe whoever’s not missing will come with them… Still, I should have said I was waiting for someone. I need some alone time to see what’s going on with Ddraig. But why am I in my swimwear? Couldn’t Sensei send me to their school? And why the beach in the particular? Well… It’s not like I am complaining…”, thought the perverted boy as he took a few more glances at Yumi.
1553221222222122122111.title: On the way

15532212222221221221111.content:
After a few minutes, the two arrived to a small beach shack, with three girls laying next to it. A petite brown-haired girl which she held in two pigtails, with a frilly, yellow one-piece and green bracelets was making a sand castle. Helping her was a girl, who wore a bikini and several other accessories which gave the appearance of a Sengoku period armor, with her brown hair tied into a side-ponytail. But was set her apart was the scary oni mask she had on, which gave her a more intimidating aura. Lastly, on a beach chair was a blonde girl wearing a strapless black bikini and a large hat with a bat motif, that was casually playing on her phone. These girls were Minori, Murakumo and Shiki, member of Gessen's elite shinobi.

Issei couldn't help but stare at the beauties in front of him, their swimsuits perfectly showing their impressive busts, which ranged from around Ravel's size to Rossweisse's. This undeniably made him more than a little aroused. But for the sake of not getting in trouble, he tried to suppress his excitement and averted his eyes from looking at their breasts. What was strange was how easy the process was. Usually it would be a lot harder, due to his nature of not being able to hold himself back whenever he saw a beautiful, well-endowed girl. But this time, while he still admired the other girls's looks, he found himself a lot more able to control his emotions.

"Please wait here a bit until I brief them over the current situation. I don't want them to think you are intruding us forcefully."

"Sure...", said Issei as Yumi went to the other girls, the others looking at him a bit in curiosity as they noticed him.

Upon looking at the group again, he noticed that indeed, someone was not present.

"Where is Yozakura?...It's weird not to see her around. She usually is with the group, and I don't think there was a time in the series she wasn't with them. Is she sick? Was there an emergency?... I could ask Yumi-san about her, but that would pretty much blow my cover..." Issei then took another glance at the girls, particularly their butts. "But I am not really complaining. The less girls to watch me like a hawk and scold me the better."

As he was looking, his feet started to tingle as they shrunk down as he got a pedicure. On top of that, the color on is dark-green trunks started to lighten a little as the yellow knot it had vanished. Suddenly, he shook his head , again his perverted thoughts being easily disrupted.

"I shouldn't do anything bad though. I can't have Yumi-san and the others be mad at me for something as trivial as this... But this a once in a lifetime opportunity. Who knows when I can look at these girls again?... But it would be inappropriate of me to do something like this... Ugh! Being around these girls makes me more conscious than I am. Why couldn't this be Homura's team?..."

While Issei was busy with his thoughts the other girls were discussing about whether or not they should let Issei sat with them.

"Miyabi-chan and her team are busy with their training today and Homura-chan and the others are working part-time, so they won't be coming."

"Oh, I see."

"But I am so excited to meet Hibari-chan and play today! I just hope Yagyu-chan will let her. She is a bit too clingy to her than she should..."

"Hehe... I guess so..."

"And Murakumo-chan is really happy to see Ikaruga-chan. She said she wanted her input on her new manga that she's making and wants her to give her opinion about it."

"Do you know what is it about?"

"Well... I took a peek or two, but it seems a little complicated. There was a girl that looked like Shiki-chan at one point, but I didn't manage to get the plot or anything like that. It was supposed to be action-themed from what I understood though."

Talking with Minori seemed something a lot more natural for Iozaeri than he thought. He believed it would be a little difficult, but they were having a conversation as if they have done it before. Also, as he stood in the sun with his arms crossed under his chest, his skin tanned a bit more, making his skin resemble the tan Minori and the other girls had, as he didn't seem to feel cold from the water anymore. On top of that, his darkening locks started to gain a bluish hue, as his now completely straight bangs began to restyle themselves to a new haircut.

"I just hope Katsuragi-san won't be causing too much trouble with her usual way to show "affection".", huffed the boy.

"Well, it is a little strange to touch a girl's chest like she does, but she doesn't seem that harmful."

"As long as she keeps her hands away for this trip, I'll be fine... But I suppose that if Ikaruga-san and Asuka-san allows it, I will relent a bit, as disgraceful at the act is."

"Well, they seem to be used to it by now..", said Minori with a slightly nervous smile. "Speaking of Asuka-chan, she was very thrilled about the invite we offered her and her team."

"She is a leader. And I can tell that she knew her team needed a bit of relaxation, given she asked everyone, including her grandfather about it.", replied Iozaeri, knowing now details that he shouldn't regarding the meeting with the Hanzo girls.

"But she was a little sad when she heard Homura-chan wouldn't be coming today."

"From what I understood, they are rivals, and very good friends, so I suppose it's natural for her to feel like that..."

"But there is something I noticed last time when we went together with everyone."

"Hm? What is that?"
15532212222221221221111112122212.title: About Asuka and her friends

155322122222212212211111121222121.content:
"Well... When we all went to visit Homura-chan and her team, she was looking quite a bit at Asuka-chan."

"Hm? In what way?"

"Well... I wouldn't say staring, but it came pretty close. And whenever Asuka-chan looked at her, she started to get slightly nervous as well."

"Really?"

"Yeah. Most of the times, Homura-chan acted normally, but when the two went to have a talk among themselves, like a "rival talk", or something like that, me and Shiki-chan saw that Homura-chan was slightly red, while Asuka-chan was a bit worried about her before she brushed it off. They than talked about defeating each other and becoming stronger, but after 10 minutes the same thing happened again before they rejoined the group."

This was surprisingly strange and at the same not really that much. It was pretty clear that in the later games of the series Homura developed a crush on Asuka, based on several dialogue lines the two shared at times, and what MInori said pretty much gave another confirmation to the fact. However, Iozaeri was starting to forget about there being games about the people he was now talking with, but this didn't stop him from understanding the situation.

"I think Homura-san likes Asuka-san more than a friend it seems."

"R-Really?!", asked the younger girl with her eyes wide open. " I mean, I knew Homura-chan blushing was strange but to be actually this is kind of... unexpected..."

"It is a little. But given that they knew each other for quite a long time before we met them, it is safe to say they grew close as a result of their rivalry... But I think Asuka-san might not be yet aware of her feelings, based on what you told me."

"I guess so... But it makes sense why she thought that."

"Thought what?"

"Uh... You liking Yumi-chan..."

Upon hearing that, Iozaeri's cheeks once again flushed, as he went into a small inner panic attack. He didn't notice how his shirt started to shrink away, partially exposing his belly button as its bottom part began to fade towards green.

"W-"What do you mean?", asked the boy in a little country accent, that wasn't too noticeable, but still present nonetheless, as his voice climbed up a little more as well, the bulge in his throat shrinking a little as well..

"P-Please hear me out! I know it sounds a bit over the top, but please listen. This is all what Shiki-chan told me, okay."

Trying not freak out further, Iozaeri started to calm down, not even sure why he reacted the way that he did.

"What was that? That's so not like me... Usually I would be happy if someone said a like likes me. Why did I become so flustered all of a sudden? Is it because she mentioned Yumi-san again? When Shiki-san mentioned her, it wasn't so bad... But I need to get a grip. I don't know what she will tell me, but I already like Rias..."

As he once again thought about Rias, her image changed a little more as she lost a few centimeters in height as her wavy hair started to straighten out as it also began to shrink, going form her tights to her back. His memories about her also changed a little, as while she still remained the leader of the group, he was now remembering her using ice-magic as well. He wasn't aware how his bony hips were now spreading a little further, as they were complimented by a small layer of fat, while his butt expanded a little as well, pushing his trunks further.

"But anyway... I'll just listen to what Minori-san will say", thought the boy in his head "I am pretty sure Shiki-san told her a bunch of things that she only thinks it's true based on her guesses.... I bet Ryona-san gave her a funny idea..."
155322122222212212211111121222121.title: More talking

1553221222222122122111111212221211.content:
Minori fidgeted a little as she tried to figure out a way to say things properly. After a few seconds, she decided to begin while Iozaeri listened carefully.

"Well... You know that you are by far one of the most respectful people we know, right?"

"Oh... Okay...", replied Iozaeri a little confused. "What does she mean? I mean, sure I do listen to other people's needs or opinions, but is that all?... I wouldn't go that far. In comparison, Yumi-san... I mean Rias-san would fit this description way better than I do.", thought the boy, not minding much of his small slip-up.

"And we know that Homura-chan and Asuka-chan's relationship is based abound the respect they have for one another... So with that in mind, and the fact that both you and Yumi-chan always try to improve yourselves like they do, together, she said that you pretty much are like them in a way..."

"But that's way too far-fetched! It's not like we stutter or blush around one another. And there's more to liking someone than just that!"

"I know that! And that's what I also told her... But then she said that you are more like Ikaruga-chan and Yomi-chan."

"Huh?"

"We... don't know if they like each other or not, but Shiki-chan did say they are like a married couple at times. I still don't see it really... but you two do kind of remind me of them, with how caring you are for us, and how much you both take charge at times... It kind of makes sense..."

Iozaeri was starting to have his cheeks red again, but there was also something unsettling regarding what Minori said that concerns him.

"Where is this coming from? When did I ever say anything about taking the lead? And what's this thing about caring for them or training with Yumi? Is this another one of Shiki-san's pranks? It has to be. The whole thing about romance is one thing but..."

His thought process was interrupted when his already tight shirt seemed to massage his chest. While it wasn't visible, this made him slightly aroused, as both his shirt and trunks continued to shrink. His bottoms settled for a light green color as their legs almost completely vanished, while the same green appeared on his shirt too, but only on the bottom part, the top staying white. In addition, its sleeves disappeared entirely, as it now resembled a tank top, while it now exposed his navel. Lastly, his chest started to push out a little, as small fat deposits started to accumulate there, forming petite A-cup breasts due to the massage, but they remained invisible for the time being. Despite all this, he managed to get a hold of his feelings, as his blush getting a little deeper was the only thing that was noticeable.

Normally he would have a lot more difficulty to control his urges, but his mind was also changing with his body, which made him feel less excited currently. Also, his memories of the other girls from the ORC were starting to vanish, as the group that Rias led was no longer the members of the club, but a completely different team that he currently couldn't remember. His perspective of her also changed a bit more, as her expression turned from alluring and seductive to modest and caring, while her hair now reached to her mid-back.

Minori didn't seem to notice the changes to his clothing, but was getting a little worried to Iozaeri's pause.

"Hey, are you feeling okay?"

"Y-Yeah, I'm fine, don't worry about it."

"Do you want to sit down? We can head back if you want..."
1553221222222122122111111212221211.title: Minori's explanation

15532212222221221221111112122212112.content:
Iozaeri didn't feel exactly lightheaded, but he was feeling how his head was getting cloudier by the second, so he decided that laying down a bit might be needed.

"Let's go back for now. We still need to have enough energy for when Asuka-san and the other would be coming. You did say you were looking forward to play with Hibari-san."

"Yeah! But are you dizzy? You looked a bit lost back there..."

"No worries. It's just a small wave of vertigo."

"If you say so..."

With that, the two started to walk back to the beach. Iozaeri did feel his shirt was tighter on him and that it didn't feel the same on his skin, but didn't bother to think too much on it. He was a bit confused where that small period of arousal came from or why it even happened. He initially thought it was due to a fantasy he imagined of him and Yumi after the whole conversation with Minori, but he couldn't remember having any dirty thoughts. There was also something that Minori said before that unsettled him, but he was having a little bit of trouble remembering what exactly it was that made him nervous.

He didn't see that his figure was becoming smaller as his shoulders became less broad and more round or that his waist started to pull in. While most of the muscle he developed during his training has vanished, but despite now having a washboard-flat abdomen, it still remained well toned.

Eventually the pair arrived back at their spot, with Murakumo still working on her manga, but with Shiki nowhere to be seen.

"Huh? Where is Shiki-chan?"

"She went to be restroom not that long ago. Did you two had fun?", asked the masked girl with a monotone voice.

"Yeah, we had lots of fun! We played a lot, it was almost like a mini tournament!"

"Haha... I wouldn't go that far Minori-san... But we did play quite a lot..."

"I see. So what are you going to do?"

"I want to play cards until Hibari-chan arrives. Do you want to join?"

"I'm sorry, but I need to finish my work for today. After Ikaruga arrives, I don't know if I'll be able to complete my draft, and I want to show her my sketches."

"No problem. I'll just play with Shiki-chan instead."

"And I think I'll rest for a bit."

"Do you feel tired?"

"Not in particular, but I feel like I need to lay down for a little while."

"I see. You may as well. And don't worry about Shiki. I'll tell her not to disturb you."

"Thanks. I appreciate it."

With that Minori sat down, next to Murakumo while Iozaeri sat on the beach chair. The second he did that though, he felt like the chair was more cushy than before. But he quickly dismissed the thought, as he knew there wasn't a pillow or anything of the sorts on the chair. He didn't see that his butt continued growing, slowly becoming larger and firmer as he sat down. He closed his eyes just before Shiki apparently arrived, something which he considered lucky for. He didn't want her to ask him all those questions again, and was grateful when Murakumo told her to let him rest before sitting down to play with Minori.

He wasn't entirely wrong when he said he needed to rest a bit, due to all the things that confused him, but in reality he wanted to try and figure out what exactly was wrong, as he felt more and more like the things that weirded him out before were getting more and more natural for him.
15532212222221221221111112122212112.title: They head back

155322122222212212211111121222121122.content:
Despite feeling a little tired, Iozaeri decided to feign sleeping while he tried to ignore the voices of the other girls to attempt to clear his head of the weird thoughts he was having for a while.

"This is getting more and more confusing... And I thought when I went to the bathroom was bad enough. Now I am not even sure what to think... First of all, why did Minori-san say all those things regarding me and Yumi-san? Sure, the whole thing about having a crush on her aside, training with Yumi-san and caring for them is strange... Sure, I do care about them a lot, and they are all very dear to me, but even so, it's not like they are just like my siblings. I just can't picture Shiki-san as one and... Wait, siblings?... I am an only child, right? No, that doesn't sound right... I could swear I had a younger brother, no two... and a sister... Wait a second... I am the oldest of twelve, aren't I? It sounds weird, but that's the truth, isn't it?"

Iozaeri was gradually remembering the faces of eleven children, all of them hugging him, and laughing with him, the oldest of which didn't look more than ten. For a brief second, he thought he was their caretaker, but then he realized they were his siblings. He was getting fond memories of them helping him around the house cleaning, cooking and then playing various games in he living room.

As he was relishing these memories, his hair styled itself into a bowl-cut, with all of his unruly locks of hair straightening out. On top of that, the faint blue accents that appeared not that long ago were slowly getting more dominant as the color of his hair was gradually changing, the brown gradually being replaced by a dark-blue. While it would be a little longer for the color to reach the proper tone, it surely no longer resemble his original haircut.

As pleasant as the memories were, Iozaeri decided put them on the side for the moment. There was something else regarding his parents that he should remember, but for now, something else was his focus.

"... I also acted a bit off, didn't I? Normally I would just enjoy looking at a girl in a swimsuit, but now it feels wrong to do so... I mean, there is no real problem as long as you don't stare and make tasteless comments. I respect a woman's body and their features. It is natural for a girl to take pride her figure... As long as they don't do the same thing Shiki-san does and try to show her appeal whenever she wants. I always wonder now Murakumo-san manages to deal with her on a daily basis... It would be great if there were more girls like Rias-san. She has great style, is modest and cares about her appearance, while not trying to get attention. That's why I like her so much..."

Once again, his mind drifted towards Rias, but unlike before, when her physical allure and charm would be the first thing for him to notice, particularly her chest, this time it looked more like Iozaeri was instead drawn by the serene, composed and caring expression Rias now had. but he didn't notice how her more mature features that she had were now gradually replaced with a much younger visage, as the face of the woman he adored was slowly starting to resemble someone else's.

On top of that, another faint wave of arousal emerged from within him, but it was nowhere near as intense as it would normally be. His top massaged his chest again as the small breasts he possessed grew quite a bit, as they became a little visible through the shirt as the became large A-cups. Also, his manhood tingled a little as his trunks started to do the same process as the top. This made its size to start diminishing along with his testes, as its size was now roughly a little bigger than half of its size. He grunted a little and was about to question what was happening when the massage stopped as quickly as it started.
155322122222212212211111121222121122.title: Thinking

1553221222222122122111111212221211221.content:
Iozaeri felt as though his clothes were moving on his own, but was unable to make a connection with how was this happening and in return tried to ignore it. However, this alongside the noise made from Minori as she appeared to lose to Shiki made it impossible for him to try and concentrate on his thoughts or to manage to fall asleep. He strangely felt a little better though, even if the fog in his head didn't disappear.

He rubbed his eyes as he looked around and saw Muraumo still drawing and Minori and Shiki playing cards, with the former winning a few times already based on her grin and the smaller girl's pout. He couldn't see it, but his original hazel eyes were now not only bigger, with his eyelashes now being longer as well, but their color completely changed to a deep blue, resembling the same shade as his hair.

"Did you sleep well Yozakeri?", asked Shiki as he noticed him awake, with the other girls also looking at him.

"I wouldn't call it a sleep, but I managed to rest a bit."

"Sorry if we woke you up. I think I got a little too mad..."

"It's okay Minori-san, don't worry about it."

"Say can we play after this game? Shiki-chan is very mean and didn't let me win one game."

"It's not my fault that you are so easy to read Minori-chin. If this was like poker or something like that you would lose all your savings if you play like this."

" You played with Ryobi-chan so of course you have experience! And I saw you play online too!"

"Haha... Fair enough. Okay, I will take it easy this time, I promise."

"...Fine. But no taunting."

"Hey, those aren't taunts."

"Yes they were!"

As the two girls continued their game, the other two sighed as Yozakeri sat down next to Murakumo, looking at what she was drawing.

"So... What's the story all about? Shiki-san told me a few things, but it was pretty vague."

"Well... I guess I could tell you, but promise to keep it a secret. I can't trust too many people on this, and I can't show you my sketches, as I want only Ikaruga and Yomi to see them.", said the masked girl as the boy nodded in response before she continued. "It is in a way a story about fictional beings like devils, angels and such in a medieval setting, but instead of knights or magicians fighting them this time a group of shinobi are the protagonists."

The story sounded quite interesting to Yozakeri, but there was something that resonated within him as well the more that he listened to the story. However he was unable to say what exactly. When he heard "devil" he felt a little nostalgic, but without knowing why, he shook his head a little as he listened to Murakumo's description.

His thoughts on Rias continued to change as the group that she lead was now composed of shinobis, but it was far smaller, with only her and four other people fighting what appeared to be a demon or yokai of sorts, although he felt like it had another name as well. Also, as weird as it sounded to him, he started to believe he was one of the members of the squad, even if he currently didn't think of himself as a shinobi.

He missed the fact that his top was now losing a good amount of material in the back, slowly exposing more of his back, while the bottom resembled his trunks perfectly in terms of color, as the upper part remained white.

"I am also thinking to add some romantic elements to the story as well."

"Really? How are going to incorporate it?"

"That's why I wanted Ikaruga and Yomi's input on this. Or do you have a suggestion as well?"

"You... are asking me?"

"Well, I know you read quite a lot of books with Yumi, so if you have an idea, I would be curious to listen."

"I don't know... I am not really into those types of books..."
1553221222222122122111111212221211221.title: Waking up

15532212222221221221111112122212112212.content:

"No, but Minori-chin became upset when she saw I whiffed the win on purpose. I tried to be subtle, but after she saw my hand she kind of figured out I let her win. She needs to play serious from time to time though. Like, with someone more serious like you two or Hikage-chin."

Normally, he would try his best to try and catch a glimpse of a dirty magazine, or even hear the story of it if possible, especially since this might be the only chance he would have. But right now, the thought of such a story made him nervous and a little disgusted and embarrassed. And the thought that a manga with a such a content was made by these girls actually made him a little angry as well. A sense of responsibility was slowly growing in him, as he felt like it was his duty to keep these girls in line, even if currently he couldn't understand why.

During the discussion, his waist compressed further, which combined with his hips and still growing rear, gave him the bottom of an hourglass figure. He also felt something in his throat, coughing a bit, before the sensation vanished, as his Adam's apple disappeared.

"I sure hope you don't plan to make something like that again.", said Yozakeri in a girl's voice, which somehow sounded familiar to him before brushing the thought off, thinking his current voice was his own.

"Of course not. That was just an error that we won't repeat.", said the masked girl, which made Shiki sigh in response.

"Sure... It's not like I wanted something like that to be made by Murakumo-chin. though it would be funny."

"Shiki!"

"Yozakeri, make sure he doesn't look."

Shiki became a tad upset at this as Murakumo went to play with Minori, leaving Yozakeri and Shiki alone. The latter however started to get a little nervous as a grin crept on the blonde's lips. He knew where this was going.
15532212222221221221111112122212112212.title: Shiki comes over

155322122222212212211111121222121122122.content:
"You know, regarding the whole thing with you liking Yumi-chin, I wanted to ask a little more...", started the blonde with a sly smile before discarding it for a more laid-back facial expression. "... But given that I made you left and you were quite angry because of it, I will put it on the side for now."

"No problem. But keep in mind what I said and what Minori-chin said, okay? She told me about your little talk while you were sleeping. And don't worry, I didn't ask for too many details."

Yozakeri was still a little bothered by how accepting Shiki was and that she knew about the conversation he and Minori had before, but given that she didn't seem as keen to ask him any more made him ease a little bit.

"By the way, I wanted to ask you something. How do you see Asuka-chin and Homura-chin?"

"You also told Minori-san about it. She said you believe Homura-san might have a crush on Asuka-san, didn't you?"

"Well, it is kind of obvious. I mean, she is also Miyabi-chin's rival in a way, given their past, but like, those two are a lot closer than you expect."

"To be honest, it kinda looks that way at first, but then is Homura-chan's constant blushing whenever the tiniest bit of skinship is involved. Sure, most of the time she acts perfectly normal, but there are times you see her flustered, timid or nervous around Asuka-chin. She even is like a tsundere at times."

Now this was odd for him. He always thought Homura to be a tomboy that is interested in fights more than anything that acts like a strong, but caring leader when needed. So to hear something like this about her was surprising... But when thinking back, he didn't interact with her too much or knew her that good like the girls from Hanzo's Academy did. She seemed like a more reckless, and less perverted Katsuragi, but didn't spend that much time trying to know her. Not even when battling her squad did he learn much about her...

There was something in that line of thought that seemed wrong to Yozakeri, but before he could ponder on it, a his face started to itch a little. He scratched himself a bit, but he could feel a small buzzing sensation which worried him.

"Is there a problem?"

"No. It's just that my face itches a bit."

"Here's a towel if you need one."

Shiki handed him a light green towel that he used to rub his face. As he rubbed it, he could feel the itchiness going away, but this was more that his face finished changing. By the time he was done, his cheekbones grew higher as his lips became a little plumper while his nose and ears shrunk down. When he put the towel down, he now was in possession of a beautiful face that no longer resembled his previous boyish visage.

Also, his former confusion over his thoughts vanished as now in his memories he could remember the time he and his team fought the other shinobi schools in a battle royale as more images of his past with the girls at Gessen appeared in his mind. This now made him think of himself as a shinobi as the team that Rias lead consisted of him and the other girls of Gessen as her hair now just brushed her shoulders.

"Thanks. I don't know where that itch came from."

"Hey, it happens. And it was your towel. You did say you wanted to only use yours after all.", said Shiki, not finding anything wrong with Yozakeri's new face.

"Right... As for what you said before, I am kind of amazed of what you said. But still, are you sure it's true? I find it a little hard to believe Homura-san would be in love with Asuka-san."

155322122222212212211111121222121122122.title: A more casual conversation

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
"You may or may not believe this... But when we had that battle royale a while back, after talking with both of them, Yumi-chin actually thinks the two are perfect for one another and neither seem to deny it too much."

"Really? How did she find out?"

"When we fought Homura-chin and her group, she got super flustered and blushed a lot from what I understood when Yumi-chin joked that she and Asuka-chin were more like lovers than rivals and admitted with quite a lot of difficulty that Asuka-chin wasn't her property. She tried to deny there being anything, like, romantic between them, but she didn't sound too convincing by the looks of it. And when we went at Hanzo's for our rematch, after being told that Homura-chin might have feelings for her, Asuka-chin was surprised, but didn't seem bothered by the idea in the slightest . In fact she was actually enjoying the thought."

"She said they are rivals, but I think she might have feelings for Homura-chin, but she is most likely unaware of them just yet."

During the conversation, Yozakeri's hair turned completely dark-blue, just like his eyes, as he brushed off a bang from his bowl-cut, without noticing the color. ON top of that, his butt also finished growing to an amazing heart-shape that perfectly complimented the rest of his figure.

"That's really surprising... I knew the two of them were close, but I didn't expect them to be like that. This is quite the revelation... Does anyone else know about this?"

"Well, I wouldn't say they know too much, but I think Haruka-chin and Katsuragi-chin may know, given they seem to taunt Homura-chin quite a bit when it comes down to her feelings... As for the others, maybe Ikaruga-chin or Miyabi-chin might have a clue on it, but I think that's mostly limited to their closeness more than anything else."

"I see... Wait, why exactly did you want to discuss this? This was quite random and..." Yozakeri stopped as he remembered something that Minori told him before and frowned a little. "...Is this tied to how you think me and Yumi-san might have a similar relationship?"

"Well... Maybe?"

"I told you we aren't like that!"

"I know, I know... But I thought I should tell you about this since Minori-chin did brought it up."

"Is that all?"

"I am not going to, like, pressure you if don't want to talk about. But just try to think of the idea rather than outright deny it. And besides, you really think I came up with this stuff just to mess with you? We've all been together since, I don't know, a lot, so I do know how a few things about us... Who knows, maybe you are unaware like Asuka-chin."

Yozakeri was unable to see Shiki's viewpoint. It wasn't like there were that many mirroring elements between his relationship with Yumi and the one Asuka and Homura have. And besides, he wasn't into Yumi in the first place, as he still had Rias... But his image of his lover in his head was way different than it was in the beginning. And the fact that she was now the leader of she shinobi group he was part of seemed wrong as well, so he decided to close his eyes to think better about this, with Shiki silently looking at him, pondering what was he thinking.

Without anyone seeing, Yozakeri's top continued to change as its straps shifted their position, wrapping themselves around his neck, while the portion that remained white was now differentiated form the green parts. Then, the top started to shift around, with its right side seemingly getting tugged behind the left. Also, his bottoms shrunk further, completely losing their legs as they tightened around his groin. And yet neither Yozakeri, nor Shiki noticed anything out of the ordinary.
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: A surprising revelation

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
He tried to remember the various adventures they had together, given that the two of them were practically inseparable. But there were a few things that didn't sit right with him. For starters, he had the feeling that Rias was the leader of a club, not the shinobi elite of Gessen, like he currently remembered, and also thought that there should be a lot more people, not just them, Shiki, Murakumo and Minori. There was also the fact that in most of his memories, he recalled various training sessions, battles with other shinobi groups, like Asuka's or caring about his friends like they were his family, but nothing else that would involve the fate of the world or anything of the sort. And while he still fights with his fists a lot, he now seems quite reluctant to use his legs for combat, and the idea of him fighting while donning an armor doesn't seem as normal as it should.

"Something's really off... There are so many conflicting things in my head, but most of the things I have doubts over are silly. I don't know where all of these things are coming from, but I need to put these things away right now. I need to focus on Rias for the moment..."

As he cleared his head, all of the thoughts that contradicted his current memories vanished, making him fully believe his past as a shinobi to now be genuine. As he did, his top finished becoming a bikini top, as the fabric now perfectly matched the one of his trunks, while a flower motif began to appear all over his swimsuit.
