Then, just like before, the top and bottom started to seemingly move on their own as they massaged his chest and groin, as Shiki, who was still looking at him didn't seem to notice.

He once again focused on Rias, not noticing anything out of place regarding her appearance, as he enjoyed imagining her. But while he was attracted to her, he tried to purge any perverted thoughts away, thinking that they are ruining his mood. As he admired her, a white bow with blue stripes appeared in her hair, as any sign of waviness, including her ahoge were completely flattened out. Lastly, her chest started to shrink a little, as the breasts that made her stand out as one of the most endowed ladies he knew slowly grew smaller, albeit not by much for now. But while usually Yozakeri would freak out from something like this happening, right now, he also thought that Rias should have smaller breasts to not inconvenience her.

Soon, the massaging came to a halt, and while his chest didn't grow this time, his manhood did in fact grew smaller once again, now being only a third of its original size, as his testes also shrunk down considerably, not being quite small compared to how they were at the beginning.

"She looks the same in my eyes... I already have someone I like, so there shouldn't be any issues whatsoever. I don't get why Shiki-san keeps trying to convince me I may like someone else. And besides, there's no way you could find a Devil like her... Wait, Devil? Where did that come from? She is nothing like that... Although she does look like a yuki-onna when she wears her obi..."

Any lingering thoughts that had any tied to Devils and Angels also disappeared from his head, as he only thought yoma and yokai to be the only supernatural beings that he believed existed.
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: Thinking about Rias

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
"So... what is your answer Yozakera-chin?", asked Shiki, making Yozakera open his eyes and sigh.

"You really think I will give you an answer after just a moment to contemplate?"

"But it's been almost ten minutes! At least you have an idea right?"

"I thought you said you won't ask for details, correct? So I want you to keep your end of the deal."

"Fine...", murmured the blonde as she pouted a bit.

"But still, Yumi-san is really late. I wonder if something happened..."

"Don't worry. I talked with her on the phone while you and Minori-chin were in the water."

"You did?"

"Yeah. It looks like Asuka-chin's bus that was supposed to bring her and her friends here was stuck in traffic. She said that she will wait for them there anyway." Just then, her phone beeped, indicating she got a message, making her read what was sent to her. "And speaking of her, she said the bus just arrived and is now coming with Asuka-chin and her group. She should be arriving pretty soon."

"Yay! They're finally coming!", exclaimed MInori as she and Murakumo sat next to them.

"I was a bit worried before when you said they are going to be late, but I am relieved they arrived safely."

"C'mon Murasaki-chin, did you really think they had an accident or something? You sure are pessimistic..."

"Stop taunting me Shiki. I was just expressing my concern over their safety..."

Minori giggled as she watched their exchange, which continued for couple more minutes, with Yozakera also looking at them from the side with a smile.

"They never change, do they? Well, it is to be expected, but I am nonetheless happy that they don't... I am also happy Yumi-san is also returning. I was wondering what was taking her so long, but I guess it was also my fault for not asking earlier... I don't know why, but I feel a little happy that she's returning. How strange..."

He was too distracted by his thoughts to see how his breasts grow once again, going all the way to C-cups, which made a bigger window of cleavage than before. Also, on the left side of his swimsuit, on the white section, a cherry blossom flower magically appeared. Lastly, he began to feel a faint pulling sensation in his groin, as his testes slowly started to be pulled inside his abdomen.

"...Hm. Something feels off. I can't say for sure, but it seems like there is again something that seems to be against my memories... I may need a bit more time to contemplate."

Yozakera once again started to remember Rias, but he felt that he was instead having a crush on her rather than outright admitting it. He also didn't confess his feelings yet, but it didn't seem to be an issue as he initially thought. But there was also a thought that made him think that "Rias" wasn't the girl's name, and that instead it should be something else.

"Hey Yozakera-chin, are you alright?", asked the blonde, snapping him out from his thoughts. "You looked like you were distracted... Were you perhaps thinking about..."

"N-No. It was about something else."

"Well, we need to get this place for when Yumi-chin and the others are coming... Or do you want to go ahead to greet her?"
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: Shiki asks for an answer

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
"I think... I will go meet with Yumi-san and her group. I want to make sure there are no other problems."

"Okay. We will ready this place until then."

"Thanks you." After Yozakera left, Murakumo and Minori looked at Shiki with a bit of surprise.

"Uh... Shiki-chan? Why did you tell him to go? We could do this with three people, but... It is a little random to suggest something like that..."

"Well, let's just say he might miss Yumi-chin a little more than us, and maybe he wanted to see her sooner."

"That again? Shiki, I thought I told you to stop bothering him with your theories."

"Relax, Murakumo-chin. I didn't ask him anything and besides, he is went on his own, I didn't tell him to go. And he was a little like, lost back there for a second, so who knows, maybe he needs some time for himself too."

"...Why do I have a feeling you were involved in this?"

"Well, it's not like you didn't say I can't tell him a few things..."

Murakumo sighed a little frustrated with her friend's answer and behaviour, but didn't comment on it while Minori was a little worried about the situation as well, but followed her senior's decision and went to work.

Meanwhile, after putting a respectable distance between him and the girls, Yozakera slowly walked in the direction Yumi went before. But while he was a little excited to meet his leader, he was still bothered by his thoughts.

In his head, the girl's name didn't sound as right as before, as "Rias" seemed more and more inappropriate for her. The girl's bust shrunk until her breasts were smaller than Shiki's but still bigger than average nonetheless, which didn't seem to be an issue to him. The last think that was to change about her was her hair. The crimson mane she once had, was now barely touching her shoulders as the vibrant red was now gradually becoming dull, and darkening a little, with a few strands actually becoming grey.

"... She is the girl I love... no, I like, isn't she? I am a little too inexperienced with romance, and I don't even know how she feels about me. The only thing I know is from a few movies and soap operas... I am glad Shiki-san did not go with the subject further, as I would have no idea how to go from that... But something is not right. Why can't I remember her name? I don't know why I thought her name was Rias for the longest time. It sounded way too foreign, and it doesn't suit her at all... I know my mind was a little in the gutter today, especially after I came to the beach, but it shouldn't be so bad. It's surely Shiki-san fault with her taunting and for making me imagining... all those things..."

As his mind once again went to the slightly perverted thoughts from before, he gave out a small yelp as his testes were completely pulled inside him and changed function, becoming ovaries and pumping more estrogen into him. This, as an effect made his breasts grow even further to D-cups, as they were almost to their final size.

"What was that? It felt really weird... And I am not feeling a little light-headed as well... I think this is punishment for my improper thoughts.", said Yozakera to himself as he shook his head.

Currently, there was nothing in terms of personality that would be similar to how he was when he arrived at the beach. Not only he was now a lot more responsible, caring and rule-abiding, he also developed a small maternal-side that made him care after his friends a lot more, especially Shiki and Minori, his juniors, while any perverseness he had was now completely purged from his head. His memories of his former world were also gone, along with his ideal to be a harem king. There was still a small side that had troubles with figuring out who he was in love with, it it wouldn't be a problem for long.
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: He goes after Yumi

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
After recovering from the slight surge of hormones, Yozakera attempted once again to recall the name of the girl he liked. It bothered him quite a lot to not be able to remember something so crucial. He tried for a couple more minutes, but he only managed to say that her name started with "Y".

"Why is this so hard?... It is so embarrassing to forget her name...I just hope it will come naturally, as I can't have a migraine right before the others are to come... I guess I should at the very least try to get my feelings in check..."

His mind went through a small shock when he went from being madly in love to simply having a crush, which made him a little disoriented and confused. Given the fact that his head played games with him the whole day, right now he wanted to finally be able to sort everything out. He once again imagined the girl, looking at her icy-blue eyes, pale skin, amazing physique, and her short hair. But there was a problem in terms of its color as he struggled to say if it was grey or red. Something told him that it should be the latter, but the more he remembered, the more the red was becoming less vibrant and more dull, slowly turning into grey.

As he tried to remember, his breasts finished their growth to large DD-cups, a few inches away from E-cups, which were displayed beautifully by his swimming top, being slightly smaller than the ones the girl he was thinking of had. In addition, his manhood started to tingle as it became even smaller as a small pulling force was beginning to pull what was left inside him.

Thinking that just the physical aspect wasn't enough, he then went to try and remember their past together. He recalled the times she asked for a training partner, and he always volunteered, which made her very happy, the times where she acted as a leader, when she showed her care and love for her friends and when they would go together with the others to enjoy themselves in their spare time. But there was also something else that he admired about her.

"...When he had that shinobi battle royale, we went with the intent of getting rid of the "evil" shinobi and to correct Hanzo's academy for helping them before, but we soon realized that we were too narrow in our thinking. Everyone we met was just like us, with simply other ideals than our own. I expected her to be reluctant to change, given how close she was to grandpa Kurogane's teachings... but the fact that she managed to acknowledge that there is more to know about the other shnobis and their views on the world than just a label that put on them, was a sign of growth... I can feel that she became a lot more open ever since, allowing us to meet with Asuka-san's, Homura-san's and Miyabi-san's groups quite regularly after that... Not to mention that she herself decided to be more relaxed and less strict."

Yozakera then started to blush a bit. "... But to call me stronger than her? And to let me take the lead when she isn't available? I know she is quite modest, but I can't view myself as a leader. I do help her to make the others listen to us and obey the rules, but... I guess it is a sign of how much she trusts me. I am quite happy that she thinks that much of me... I don't know why, but I always feels better to have her tell me that I have improved or when we train together... It's also something I don't feel if someone else does that. I respect her fully, I want to be able to lead Gessen after and Murakumo-san graduate and I want to make her happy, given that she is always stressed out because she is a leader and... Oh. I see... So it is in a way like Shiki-san said..."

Before she could say anything more, he gave out a small whimper as his manhood was replaced with still virgin flower, effectively making her a young woman. With a cherry blossom, like the one on his swimsuit appearing on the left side of her hair and with the girl's hair becoming fully grey in his mind, his transformation was now complete, as now thought of himself as Yozakura, a second year shinobi student at Gessen High School.

"That was weird... But I guess I did realize something in the end... I think I should keep going after Yumi-san and the others.", said Yozakura to himself, as he said his crush's name with a little more affection than he thought.
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: His inner feelings

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
Less than three minutes later, Yozakura saw Yumi coming with Asuka and the rest of her friends in their summer clothes right ahead. She started walking faster in their direction, which made Yumi and the others see her.

"Yozakura-san? What are you doing here?", asked the Gessen leader as her friend stopped a few steps in front of her.

"I didn't know when would you arrive, and I thought I should come looking for you in case something happened."

"Well, this is really something you would do. Thanks for caring about us, but we're fine, there's no need to be worried.", assured Katsuragi as Ikaruga then added:

"But I suppose we are a bit at fault for not telling you about our delay."

"We're really sorry. There was this big traffic jam for almost two miles. A lot of people went for the beach and it was really crowded. It wasn't until we left the main road that we finally had a clear way."

"There's no need to apologize Asuka-san. It was to be expected, given the weather, that people would leave their house and go for a swim. We ourselves got lucky by arriving earlier this morning."

"Indeed. There weren't many cars on the road when we left, but their number was slowly picking up as we got closer to this place.", continued Yozakura.

"Uh... Perhaps we should've woken up sooner then..."

"Don't worry about it Hibari. We needed sufficient sleep for today anyway."

"In any case, should we continue? We should be arriving soon."

The rest of the group nodded before continuing their walk to their beach spot. While Yumi and Yozakura lead the way, they silently listened to the conversation the girls from Hanzo were having.

"Man.... After that trip, I am now really bored. Well, I think I know a very good way to regain my mojo..."

"Katsuragi-san, I hope you aren't thinking of once again fooling around with your way to show affection."

"C'mon Ikaruga, don't be so stiff. Hikage might be at times like a doormat, but she at the very least isn't so against it as you are."

"Bringing Hikage-san in this discussion means nothing and you know it-"

"What's wrong? Think I will spoil her? Well, she is quite fun to be around... but we both now that you also don't mind a playful grope from time to time."

"W-What? O-On what basis are you-"

"Can we not have this discussion now?!", asked Asuka, exasperated. Ikaruga blushed as she decided to stay quiet while Katsuragi pouted a bit, but also didn't continue.

"I can't wait to play with Minori-chan!", said Hibari, as she tried to steer away from the awkward conversation from before.

"Can I also play with you two?"

"Sure thing Yagyu-chan... Just don't try to make me win all the games like last time."

"G-Got it..."

"It really is a shame Homura-chan isn't here... I'm sure she would have had fun here."

"You sure bring up Homura-chan quite a lot lately.", noted the pinkette.

"Are you perhaps missing her?"

"Of course. But why do you ask Katsu-nee?"

"No reason in particular...", hummed the blonde, while Asuka looked a bit confused by this, while the others sweat-dropped a little at her.

As they continued talking, the two Gessen girls giggled a little at them.

"They never change, do they?"

"They sure don't. I guess it's a good thing in the end. It means that despite everything that happened they are still the way they were before."

"Indeed... Although something tells me Asuka-san and Homura-san might have in fact change a little recently. In more ways than one..."

"You mean..."

"Please don't mind me. I don't want them to hear about this anyway."

Given the talk she had with Shiki and Minori before, Yozakura understood what this was all about. And speaking of the relationship the two had, she blushed a little, remembering what she wanted to do before she took a deep breath and asked her leader, trying to suppress her accent:

"Say, Yumi-san... I did find a nice teahouse recently, and I was wondering if you would want to go together."

"A teahouse? Of course I would like to. But I don't think Shiki-san would rather go to a café instead and-"

"I-I mean just the two of us...", said Yozakura, surprising Yumi as she continued: "Uh... I want to have more time dedicated for trying to understand each other better... And the only time we get to do this is d-during training. So I was thinking that maybe this would be good opportunity for that. J-Just the t-two of us."

She knew she had difficulties trying to properly convey her thoughts, her blush made her look even more nervous. But to her surprise, Yumi, while taken slightly aback by the request, also had her cheeks slightly pink as well.

"O-Oh... I see. Then I suppose we can. Its been... some time since we had a private talk. I... would be happy to go with you Yozakura-san..."

While it wasn't as bad as her own stuttering, Yozakura understood that Yumi accepted, which made her answer back quickly. "T-Then once we get back, we should talk about when to go."

"Yes, that would be wise."

The two smiled at each other as they continued walking, hoping the other girls didn't hear them. Yozakura on the other hand was very happy that the girl she liked may indeed return her feelings based on her actions just now. But she would have to think about it later, as the last thing at the moment was to have Shiki or Katsuragi tease her.

She would act normal for the rest of the day, but when they would return home, she and Yumi will without a doubt have a serious talk... If she will think it would be the right moment for it...
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: Reuniting with Yumi

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
Azazel could only make a forced smile, given that he was currently literally chained to a chair right now. He was sweating bullets as he tried his best to maintain his composure, in front of the eyes full of fury that Rias, Akeno, Xenovia, Koneko, Irina, Ravel, and even Rossweisse, while Asia was having a more dejected and disappointed stare than pure anger, but she was still very upset nonetheless.

"So... Um... I guess you already found out about my project, didn't you?"

"...I asked Grayfia to install cameras in the house to record you, in case you once again did something ridiculous.", answered a very pissed off Rias.

"Well, I guess I should've expected that..."

"Enough beating around the bush. Where is Ise?"

"And don't there to sugarcoat it. Or I'll give you a little shock each time you do that."

Upon listening to Akeno's statement, the fallen angel gulped hard before opening his mouth.

"Well... Me and Ajuka talked about a way to integrate ourselves in the virtual reality, without just inserting ourselves into the story and change everything by doing so. In the end, we came up with the idea to make our avatars be the characters from the game or movie, thus keeping everything more or less the same. I decided to use Issei as a tester for one of the games I had, which had the opportunity to make an additional story line if you know how, without changing the overall story or narrative. The process worked, but... let's just say that because of the fact that the device was only in the beta phase. there were some... problems. So, to keep it short, it also changed his memories and personality to match the character's in addition to his physical changes... which resulted in him not remembering anything about us or this world."

Upon hearing the explanation, the girls had their eyes wide open before they yelled in unison: "WHAT?!"

"You mean to sent him there, not even knowing our stupid machine could do that?"

"W-Well, it wasn't like I could go there, since I need to monitor everything and-"

"That's not the point!"

"So Ise-san doesn't remember us at all?", asked Asia in a sad tone while Koneko inquired:

"So... What character is Senpai right now?"

"Well... About that..."

"You didn't make him an animal or something did you....?"

"Of course not Rias! Why would I?"

"So why are you so panicked?", asked Xenovia full of suspicion.

"I think... seeing the game will be a better way to show you."

The girls nodded, but didn't until Azazel, as he instructed Rossweisse to get to the VR display screen, showing the modified story he was talking about.

"Are those a group of girls on the beach? Did you really had to send him to a harem gave of all things? But where is Ise? I don't see him anywhere..."

"It's not a harem game... And Issei is there... He's... the one with blue hair."

Upon looking at the group again, they didn't saw any boy with blue hair among the girls. But then, a girl with short, blue hair in a bowl cut appeared on screen and going into the sea with a few other girls. It took them group five seconds before they yelled again at the same time: "YOU MADE HIM A GIRL?!"

"Y-Yeah...T-The other choices weren't all that great anyway, I thought I should give Issei a more likeable scenario...", said Azazel. which didn't stop Xenovia and Irina point their blades at his neck.

"You really think we care about your excuses?!"

"I know I promised the Lord not to take a life for petty reasons, but I find myself in a situation where I must-"

"Why... Is Ise-sama holding that girl's hand like that?, asked Ravel as she saw the girl he has become holding hands, and giving a loving expression to another girl, with silver hair and pale skin.

"About that... I guess not all of Issei was gone when the changes ended, and I guess he kept his sexuality intact despite him becoming a girl... If I were to say, I think that girl might have taken Rias's position while the whole thing about harems was most likely eliminated and- R-Rias, are you okay?"

While all the girls were now shocked by the fact that Issei was still interested in girls, they were further angered by the fact that just one girl replaced them. And Rias, who was the closest to her Pawn than everyone emitted a frightening aura as she closed the distance between her and the fallen angel, the latter starting to lose his calm as he saw the girl's eyes.

"I will allow it just this once. Rossweisse-san, please put on a barrier to not destroy the house. After that, everyone is to make Azazel receive his punishment."

"W-Wait! I-I know I screwed up but..."

"You can talk after we're done, if you can of course. Now it's time to get your just desserts...", said Rias coldly as she and the other girls, sans Asia readied themselves and their weapons while the barrier was put up.

After five seconds... a power light came from inside the house that would blind anyone that would look straight at it.
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: Back in the real world

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
"Now we will listen to what you have to say."

After 10 minutes which would be described as "torture" for a lack of a better term, Rias and the others finally stopped their assault on Azazel, who looked like he went through a war zone, while the rest of the room looked untouched.

"You know... You could've at the very least not throw everything at me at the same time...", croaked the fallen angel.

"That would've taken too long, and I don't want Ise's parents to be home when we do this."

"But I am surprised you took it as well as you did. Perhaps we didn't hit hard enough."

"Trust me Xenovia, you hit hard, and I don't lie when I say it..."

"All that aside, you do have a way to bring Ise back right?"

"Yeah, I have. He might have changed, but the Boosted Gear and the Pawn Pieces are still inside him, which means I can use those to bring him back. This device has the ability to search for any demonic energy and pinpoint it, thus allowing us to take the person out of the simulation."

"Then why didn't you stop the whole thing if could bring Issei-san back?"

"I don't think that bringing him back while changing would be a good idea. There are way too many variables."

"Are you sure it's just not because you took pleasure watching everything?"

"Jeez, give a break Akeno. You do remember Ajuka was part of this project too, right? I am just saying what he said."

Rias used her Power of Destruction to break the chains that were restricting Azazel before telling him: "If you can bring Ise back, then do it right now. Just the idea of him liking a fictional girl, while he himself is one is something I can't accept." The rest of the girls nodded in response to that statement, and let the fallen angel to his job. But after taking a look at his equipment, which was also blasted away during his "punishment", he let out a sigh and turned towards the group.

"And how do want him? As a girl in mind or body? Or as pixels if we are at that..."

"What do you mean?"

"Well, you took your time making a barrier to protect the house, but it seems the same couldn't be said about my stuff." He then stepped to the side, letting the girls see what was left of the device, which made them open their eyes as wide as before as they sweatdropped with a terrified expression on their faces. "Most of the systems are burned to a crisp or smashed to pieces and I can't vouch that the motherboard will work properly... The monitor is still working, which means we can still see him, but that's all."

"So... we can't bring him back?"

"That's why I told you to wait before. At the very least you could've done this somewhere else. Now Issei is stuck there until I repair everything."

"A-And how long will it take?"

"Two weeks most likely."

"Huh?!"

"What do you expect? It took me a month to make this thing, so what do you expect?"

The girls were now shellshocked by their mistake. Azazel's shenanigans aside, they were the ones that unleashed all those attacks from before.

"What... did we do..."

"I-Issei-san..."

"This isn't happening..."

"Not good... Not good at all..."

"We messed up..."

"We need punishment too..."

"I'm sorry Ise-sama...."

"Why didn't I see those things when I made the barrier..."

Seeing the girls being reduced to a stuttering mess, Grigori director sighed and took a pad which wasn't damaged and after a minute to input the proper settings, he gave it to Rias, showing the girl Issei has become.

"I'll talk with his parents and the school that he went to do me an errand and that he won't be here for a while. Until then, you can monitor Issei with this while I rebuild the machine."

"O-Okay. But... You didn't say who she was.

"If you want to know about this girl, I'll be short. Her name is Yozakura, is a modern ninja girl, likes to be polite, well-mannered and to always fight fair and with her fists, acts sometimes like a mother to the others, since is the oldest of twelve and..." On the screen, Yozakura leaned her head on the gray-haired girl's shoulder with a peaceful expression on her face. "... and since this series is heavily coded with having the girls have feelings for each other as there are no guys in it, she is usually shipped with Yumi, the leader of her squad, who is more or less the same as her, but also seems to like cute things. And if you were wondering, it's because of that she is attracted to her in this scenario. It's not a surprise Issei would find attractive..."

The girls listened to his words, without trying to say anything about the plot or how different their love interest did a 180 degree switch in terms of personality, but were nonetheless having a hard pillow to swallow. They had to accept that for two weeks Issei would love someone else...
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: Trying to solve the problem

1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.content:
"Ugh... What happened?", muttered Issei groggily as he rubbed his eyes. Upon looking around, he saw that he was in his bed, which confused him as to how he got there. "Why am I in my bedroom? I don't remember getting here... Hey Ddraig do you know how I got here?"

"Oh... Did you wake up partner? To be honest, I am not sure. The last thing I remember was that you were hit by a bright light before I lost consciousness. Everything after that is a blur. I do remember a girl's voice somewhere down the line, but I can't recall anything else. That beam must've put the two of us to sleep."

"You were were asleep too?... Wait, a girl's voice? Was it Rias?"

"I am not sure, but it sounded different from Gremory's. But why do you look so confused?"

"Well... I had this weird dream and-"

Just then, the door opened, as his harem made its way inside, with Asia running towards him.

"Ise-san are you okay?"

"Huh? Yeah, I am fine, but what happened? You look a bit nervous."

"You can blame Azazel for this. He apparently hit you with a ray that made you go into deep sleep for two weeks.", said Rias.

"That long?... I am not in trouble at school, am I?"

"Don't worry, he made sure to cover for you. You will have to do a bit more homework, but that should be all."

"That a relief... But a sleeping ray? That's a bit weird even for Sensei."

"Should you even be surprised at this point? We all know none of us understand why he needs all these ridiculous inventions for, even if sometimes my brother or Ajuka-sama asks for them at times."

"Good point..."

"Well, now that everything in order Ise, do you want to see my notes? I made sure to write the essentials."

"Hey, not fair Xenovia! I also took notes for Ise-kun! You were supposed to say "we", not "I" to begin with."

"School work aside, I am sure you must be hungry after all that sleep. Should I make something for dinner?"

"I-If it's okay Akeno-san, can I help too? I want to learn a bit more about cooking too."

"I took out some games to play. You will need to relax a bit before the struggle at school comes, so let's wind-off a bit."

"M-Me too! I know Ise-sama will have a lot work, but I want to join in as well if it makes it more relaxing."

"Usually I am against playing games before studying, but I will make an exception this time."

"Looks like everyone is already trying to have some time with you after this long. I hope you will have some time for me as well Ise."

"Of course. Anytime."

While the group was debating what to do, Ddraig asked Issei again in his mind.

"So... What was this dream about?"

"Huh?.... Oh. It was weird, that's for sure. You remember about that game with ninja girls from a while back?"

"That ridiculous one, with the girls not wearing anything that resembled ninja garb that was pure fanservice? If you're going to say that it was-"

"It wasn't just fanservice, and it was weird. It was almost like, I saw things as if I was there, it was extremely real. But after a while, I didn't feel like myself. It was like I was somebody else."

"What do you mean by that?"

"It started off with me meeting a girl from the game, Yumi, and her friends, but one of them, Yozakura was missing. It was not seeing her there, when everyone else was... But after that, I forgot about her and it seemed like I took her place in a way... After that, it was like a few weeks have passed, with me not feeling like myself, but like Yozakura. Does that make sense?"

"It wouldn't be the strangest thing to dream about... But to see yourself as someone else is indeed unexpected..."

"I think the girls knew about this."

"What makes you sat that?"

"When they came in, they looked nervous, but after telling about Sensei's ray, they were a lot more relaxed, almost happy that I believed what they said."

"Now that you mention it... They were a bit tense. Are you going to ask them about it?"

"... I don't think I should. They must keep quiet for a reason, and I really don't want to think about Sensei's ray actually did, so I think I should just forget about it."

"... That's most likely for the best."

Issei never knew what exactly happened, but he wasn't going to really ponder on it too much in the future. As for the girls, a repeat of what happened would most likely have them go through a mental breakdown, as it surely was an experience they would never want to see Issei as a girl kissing another girl, among other things. As for Azazel... Let's just say he never tried to create another virtual world for a long while...
1553221222222122122111111212221211221221.title: A strange dream
